Omogući kontekstni izbornik i odaberite, dopustite odabir, dopustite kopiranje, dopustite desnom tipkom miša na tako ograničene stranice. Instaliranje ovog besplatnog proširenja omogućava vam rezanje, kopiranje i zalijepite putem izbornika desnog klika Office na webu. Zbog ograničenja web preglednika, kopiranja i lijepljenja u Microsoft Office za web putem izbornika zahtijeva dodatna dopuštenja koja se pružaju ovim proširenjem. Omogući kopiju i pravo- Kliknite na zaštićene web stranice. Upotreba: - Kliknite ikonu akcije preglednika da biste unijeli "način kopiranja" za trenutnu web lokaciju Značajke: - otključava kopiranje (za stvarno) - sjeća se koje web mjesto za deblokiranje za buduće posjete ---> Jednom kada se ovo proširenje instalira, morate ponovno učitati bilo koje otvorene kartice kako bi se radilo <--- ---> Ako vi Promijenite postavke proširenja bilo koje otvorene kartice moraju biti ponovno učitane kako bi stupili na snagu <---- Obavezno ponovno učitajte web stranicu nakon instaliranja ovog proširenja. -Budući da je potrebno proširenje Da biste znali aktivne kartice, tako da je osnovno dopuštenje koje je potrebno "kartice". Ali Chrome će ga označiti kao "mogu čitati i promijeniti sve svoje podatke na web stranicama koje posjetite", a istovremeno tražite dozvolu. Ovo proširenje ne prati ili ne koristi vašu povijest pregledavanja na bilo koji način. Jedini su potrebni podaci aktivna stanja kartice. Copy & Paste Pro proširenje "Omogući desnom tipku klik" rješenje je za web stranice koje blokiraju kopiranje, zalijepite, odaberite tekst i desne klikove. - ovo proširenje za svaku karticu djeluje odvojeno. Klikom na ikonu proširenja omogućit će je/onemogućiti.
- proširenje se onemogućuje na Reload stranicama.
- Provjerite status omogućen (zeleni krpelj) ili onemogućeno (sivi krpelj) proširenja na alatnoj traci (gornji desno kut). Omogućite desni klik - Ograničite kopiranje/odabir je aplikacija koja korisnicima omogućuje rezanje, kopiranje i zalijepiti putem alatnih traka za desno kliknite izbornike i vrpce kada koristite Office na webu. Instaliranje ovog besplatnog proširenja omogućava vam da omogućite kopiranje, dopustite kopiranje, kliknite desni klik, jednostavna kopiranja, omogućite desnom tipkom miša, ograničite kopiranje, kontekstni izbornik i omogućite kopiranje i lijepljenje u Microsoft Officeu za web putem izbornika. Ovo proširenje djeluje neovisno za svaku karticu; Klikom na ikonu proširenja omogućit će ga/onemogućiti. Proširenje se onemogućuje na ponovnoj puti stranica; Provjerite omogućen status (zeleni krpelj) ili onemogućeno (sivi krpelj) proširenja na alatnoj traci (gornji desni kut). Zbog ograničenja web preglednika, kopiranje i lijepljenje u Microsoft Officeu za web putem izbornika zahtijeva dodatna dozvola koja se pružaju ovim proširenjem. Otključava kopiju (za stvarno) i pamti koje web stranice za deblokiranje za buduće posjete. Ovo proširenje ne prati ili koristi povijest pregledavanja ni na koji način; Jedine informacije koje su joj potrebne su aktivna stanja kartica. Obavezno ponovno učitajte web stranicu nakon instaliranja ovog proširenja; Ako promijenite postavke, bilo koje otvorene kartice moraju biti ponovno učitane kako bi stupili na snagu. Budući da proširenje mora znati aktivne kartice, tako da je osnovno dopuštenje koje je potrebno "kartice". Međutim, Chrome će ga označiti kao "može čitati i promijeniti sve vaše podatke na web stranicama koje posjetite", a istovremeno tražite dozvolu. Uvođenje neophodnog proširenja: "Omogućite desni klik - ograničite kopiranje/odaberite" Jeste li umorni od ograničenja koja su nametnuli web preglednici kada je u pitanju kopiranje i lijepljenje u Microsoft Officeu za web? Ne tražite dalje! S besplatnim proširenjem, "Omogućite desni klik - Ograničite kopiranje/odaberite", sada možete osloboditi puni potencijal vaših kopija i zalijepljenih funkcija. Ovo moćno proširenje pruža vam mogućnost rezanja, kopiranja i zalijepljenja Bez napora korištenjem izbornika i trake za vrpcu dok radite s Officeom na webu. Pozdravite se s frustrirajućim ograničenjima i pozdrav s bešavnom produktivnošću. "Omogućite desni klik - Ograničite kopiranje/odabir" djeluje neovisno za svaku karticu, pružajući vam potpunu kontrolu nad svojim iskustvom kopiranja. Jednostavno kliknite ikonu proširenja kako biste je omogućili ili onemogućili. Pronaći ćete status proširenja prikladno prikazanog na alatnoj traci u gornjem desnom kutu - zeleni krpelj označava omogućeno, dok sivi krpelj označava onemogućen. Ali kako ovo proširenje djeluje na svoju magiju? Pa, zbog određenih ograničenja svojstvenih web preglednicima, potrebna su dodatna dozvola za kopiranje i lijepljenje u Microsoft Officeu za web putem izbornika. Ovdje je korisno "Omogući desni klik - Ograničite kopiranje/odabir". Otključava istinsku moć kopiranja (za stvarnu), pa čak i pamti koje web stranice za deblokiranje za buduće posjete. Budite sigurni, ovo proširenje poštuje vašu privatnost ne praćenjem ili korištenjem povijesti pregleda na bilo koji način. Sve što treba je poznavanje vaših aktivnih kartica. Da biste u potpunosti uživali u prednostima ovog proširenja, budite sigurni da ponovo učinite web stranicu nakon instalacije. Ako napravite bilo kakve promjene u postavkama, imajte na umu da sve otvorene kartice moraju biti ponovno učitane kako bi stupili na snagu. Chrome može zatražiti dopuštenje označeno kao "mogu čitati i promijeniti sve svoje podatke na web stranicama koje posjetite", ali ne boji se - to je jednostavno zato što je proširenje potrebno pristupiti da bi se znalo koje su kartice aktivne. Doživite potpuno novu razinu od cijele nove razine Praktičnost i učinkovitost s "Omogućite desni klik - ograničite kopiranje/odaberite." Ne dopustite da vas ograničenja preglednika suzdržavaju - osnažite se da kopirate, zalijepimo i osvajate s lakoćom. Predstavljanje rješenja za krajnje kopije i zalijepi: Omogućite desni klik - ograničite kopiranje/odaberite Jeste li umorni od ograničenja od kopiranja i lijepljenja u Microsoft Officeu za web? Ne tražite dalje! S besplatnim proširenjem, "Omogućite desni klik - ograničite kopiranje/odaberite", sada možete otključati snagu rezanja, kopiranja i zalijepiti kroz desno kliknite izbornike i alatnu traku vrpce. Ovo nevjerojatno proširenje pruža dodatna dopuštenja potrebna za omogućavanje kopiranja i lijepljenja u Microsoft Officeu za web. Pozdravite se s frustrirajućim ograničenjima i pozdrav za besprijekornu produktivnost. Jedna od značajki koje se uklanjaju desnom tipkom miša - ograničavanje kopiranja/odabira je njegova sposobnost neovisnog rada za svaku karticu. Jednostavno kliknite ikonu proširenja kako biste je omogućili ili onemogućili. Osim toga, nikada se nećete morati brinuti o gubitku postavki jer se proširenje automatski onemogućuje nakon ponovnog učitavanja stranica. Pratite status proširenja brzim pogledom na alatnu traku u gornjem desnom kutu. Razumijemo da web preglednici imaju svoja ograničenja kada je u pitanju kopiranje i lijepljenje u Microsoft Officeu za web. Zbog toga je ovo proširenje tu da spasi dan. Otključava funkcionalnost kopiranja tako da uistinu možete osloboditi potencijal produktivnosti. I ne brinite, omogućite desnom tipkom miša - ograničite kopiranje/odaberite Poštujte vašu privatnost ne praćenjem ili korištenjem povijesti pregleda na bilo koji način. Potreban je samo pristup aktivnim stanjima vaših kartica. Da biste osigurali nesmetano djelovanje, ne zaboravite ponovno učitati svoju web stranicu nakon instaliranja ovog proširenja za promjenu igre. Ako napravite bilo kakve promjene u postavkama, obavezno ponovno učitajte sve otvorene kartice kako bi stupili na snagu. Chrome može zatražiti dopuštenje označeno kao "mogu čitati i promijeniti sve svoje podatke na web stranicama koje posjetite", ali budite sigurni da je jednostavno potrebno znati koje su kartice aktivne. Pozdravite se za kopiranje ograničenja i pozdrav u cjelinu Nova razina produktivnosti s omogućavanjem desnog klik - Ograničite kopiranje/odaberite. Ne propustite ovo proširenje koje će revolucionirati način na koji radite u Microsoftovom uredu za web. Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions. This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity. "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled. But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs. To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active. Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner. We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs. Engedélyezze a Környezetvédelmi menüt, és válassza ki, engedélyezze a kiválasztást, engedélyezze a másolatot, engedélyezze a jobb egérgombbal az ilyen korlátozott oldalakat. Iroda az interneten. Kattintson a védett webhelyek elemre. Melyik webhelyet kell feloldani a jövőbeni látogatásokhoz 
 
 ---> Miután a kiterjesztés telepítése után újra kell töltenie a nyitott lapokat, hogy működjön <--- 
 
 ---> Ha Ön Változtassa meg a kiterjesztési beállításokat Bármely nyitott lapot újratölteni kell ahhoz, hogy azok hatályba léphessenek <---- 
 
 Ügyeljen arra, hogy a kiterjesztés telepítése után feltöltse a weboldalt. 
 
-Mivel a kiterjesztési igények igényei Az aktív lapok megismeréséhez, tehát az alapvető engedély, amelyet igényel, a "fülek". A Chrome azonban úgy jelöli, hogy "elolvashatja és megváltoztathatja az összes adatot a meglátogatott webhelyeken", miközben engedélyt kér. Ez a kiterjesztés semmilyen módon nem követi nyomon vagy használja a böngészési előzményeit. fülek. 
 
 Másolat és beillesztés Pro kiterjesztés "A jobb gombbal való engedélyezés" megoldás olyan webhelyek számára, amelyek blokkolják a példányt, beillesztik a szöveget és a jobb kattintást. 
 
- Ez a kiterjesztés minden laphoz külön működik. A kiterjesztési ikonra kattintva engedélyezi/letiltja azt. 
- A kiterjesztés letiltja az oldal újratöltését. sarok). 
 A jobb egérgombbal való engedélyezése - A másolat/kiválasztás korlátozása olyan alkalmazás, amely lehetővé teszi a felhasználók számára, hogy vágjanak, másoljanak és illesszenek be a jobb gombbal kattintson a menük és a szalag eszköztárakon keresztül, ha az interneten használják az irodát. Az ingyenes kiterjesztés telepítése lehetővé teszi a másolás, a másolat, a jobb egérgombbal kattintás, az egyszerű másolás engedélyezése, a jobb gombbal való engedélyezés, a másolat, a helyi menü korlátozásának engedélyezését, valamint a Microsoft Office -ba a webes másolását és beillesztését a menükön keresztül. Ez a kiterjesztés minden lapon önállóan működik; A kiterjesztési ikonra kattintva engedélyezi/letiltja azt. A kiterjesztés letölti az oldal újratöltését; Ellenőrizze az eszköztáron (a jobb felső sarok) engedélyezett (zöld kullancs) vagy letiltott (szürke kullancs) állapotát. 
 
 A böngészők korlátozásai miatt, másolás és beillesztés a Microsoft Office -ba az interneten keresztül menükön keresztül további engedélyeket igényel, amelyeket ezen a kiterjesztésen keresztül nyújtanak. Ez kinyitja a másolatot (valódi), és emlékszik arra, hogy mely webhelyek feloldják a jövőbeni látogatásokra. Ez a kiterjesztés semmilyen módon nem nyomon követi vagy nem használja a böngészési előzményeket; Az egyetlen információ, amelyre szüksége van, a lapok aktív állapota. 
 
 Ügyeljen arra, hogy a kiterjesztés telepítése után újratöltse a weboldalt; Ha megváltoztatja a beállításokat, minden nyitott lapot újratölteni kell, hogy azok hatályba léphessenek. Mivel a meghosszabbításnak tudnia kell az aktív füleket, tehát az alapvető engedély, amelyet igényel, a "fülek". A Chrome azonban úgy jelöli, hogy "elolvashatja és megváltoztathatja az összes adatot a meglátogatott webhelyeken", miközben engedélyt kér. Bemutatja a kötelező -HaVe kiterjesztést: "A jobb egérgombbal való engedélyezése - Korlátozzon másolat/válassza a" 
 
 Fáradt -e a böngészők által a Microsoft Office interneten történő másolását és beillesztésekor? Ne keressen tovább! Az ingyenes kiterjesztéssel: "A jobb egérgombbal való engedélyezés - Korlátozzon másolat/válasszon", most felszabadíthatja a másolat és a beillesztési funkciók teljes potenciálját. Könnyedén használja a jobb gombbal kattintson a menük és a szalag eszköztáron, miközben az Office-nál dolgozik az interneten. Búcsúzzon a frusztráló korlátozásokról és üdvözölje a zökkenőmentes termelékenységet. Egyszerűen kattintson a kiterjesztési ikonra az engedélyezéshez vagy letiltáshoz. A jobb felső sarokban lévő eszköztáron kényelmesen megjelenített kiterjesztés állapotát találja - a zöld kullancs engedélyezve van, míg egy szürke kullancs letiltva van. 
 
 De hogyan működik ez a kiterjesztés a varázslat? Nos, a böngészőknek rejlő bizonyos korlátozások miatt további engedélyekre van szükség a Microsoft Office -ba az interneten keresztüli másoláshoz és beillesztéséhez. Itt a "Jobbgombbal kattintson - a másolás/kiválasztás" engedélyezése ". Felszabadítja a másolat valódi erejét (valódi), sőt emlékszik arra is, hogy mely webhelyeket feloldják a jövőbeni látogatásokhoz. Biztos lehet benne, hogy ez a kiterjesztés tiszteletben tartja magánéletét azáltal, hogy semmilyen módon nem nyomon követi vagy nem használja fel a böngészési előzményeit. Csak annyit kell tennie, hogy ismeri az aktív füleket. Ha bármilyen módosítást hajt végre a beállításokban, ne feledje, hogy az összes nyitott lapot újratölteni kell, hogy hatályba lépjen. A Chrome kérhet engedélyt, amelynek címkézése: "Olvassa el és módosítsa az összes adatot a meglátogatott webhelyeken", de ne félj - ez egyszerűen azért van, mert a kiterjesztésnek hozzáférést igényel, hogy megismerje, mely lapok aktívak. 
 Tapasztalja meg a teljesen új szintet. Kényelem és hatékonyság a "jobb gombbal való engedélyezés - a másolás/válogatás korlátozása" segítségével. Ne hagyja, hogy a böngésző korlátozásai visszatarthassanak - felhatalmazza magát arra, hogy könnyedén másolja, beilleszti és meghódítsa. Bemutatja a végső másolat és beillesztési megoldást: Engedélyezze a jobb egérgombbal - korlátozza a másolatot/válasszon 
 
 Unod már, hogy korlátozódik -e a Microsoft Office másolásától és beillesztéséből az interneten? Ne keressen tovább! Az ingyenes kiterjesztéssel, "A jobb egérgombbal való engedélyezés - a másolás/kiválasztás" korlátozása, most feloldhatja a vágás, a másolat és a beillesztés teljesítményét a jobb egérgombbal a menük és a szalag eszköztáron keresztül. 
 
 Ez a hihetetlen kiterjesztés biztosítja a szükséges további engedélyeket, amelyek lehetővé teszik a Microsoft Office interneten történő másolását és beillesztését. Búcsúzzon a frusztráló korlátozásoktól és üdvözölje a zökkenőmentes termelékenységet. 
 
 A jobb egérgombbal rendelkező engedélyezés egyik kiemelkedő funkciója - A Copy/Select korlátozása az, hogy minden lapon önállóan működjön. Egyszerűen kattintson a kiterjesztési ikonra az engedélyezéshez vagy letiltáshoz. Ráadásul soha nem kell aggódnia a beállítások elvesztése miatt, mivel a kiterjesztés automatikusan letiltja magát az oldal újratöltésekor. Figyelje a hosszabbítás állapotát, gyors pillantással a jobb felső sarokban lévő eszköztárra. Ezért van ez a kiterjesztés a nap megmentésére. Feloldja a másolási funkciókat, így valóban felszabadíthatja a termelékenységi potenciálját. És ne aggódjon, engedélyezze a jobb egérgombbal - korlátozza a másolat/válassza az adatvédelem tiszteletben tartását azáltal, hogy semmilyen módon nem követi nyomon vagy használja a böngészési előzményeit. Csak hozzáférést igényel a lapok aktív állapotához. Ha bármilyen módosítást hajt végre a beállításokban, feltétlenül töltse be újra az összes nyitott lapot, hogy hatályba léphessen. A Chrome kérhet engedélyt, amelynek címkézése: "Elolvashatja és megváltoztathatja az összes adatot a meglátogatott webhelyeken", de biztos lehet benne, hogy egyszerűen meg kell tudnia, hogy mely lapok aktívak. A termelékenység új szintje a jobb egérgombbal - korlátozza a másolat/válogatást. Ne hagyja ki ezt a kötelező kiterjesztést, amely forradalmasítja a Microsoft Office webes munkájának módját. Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

Say goodbye to copy restrictions and hello to a whole new level of productivity with Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select. Don't miss out on this must-have extension that will revolutionize the way you work in Microsoft Office for the web. Get ready to unleash the power of copy and paste like never before.

Aktifkan Menu Konteks dan Pilih, Izinkan Pilih, Izinkan Salin, Izinkan Klik Kanan di So ORANG-HALAMAN SO DRICTICE. 
 
 Menginstal ekstensi gratis ini memungkinkan Anda untuk memotong, menyalin, dan menempel melalui menu klik kanan dan bilah alat pita saat menggunakan Kantor di web. 
 
 Karena keterbatasan browser web, menyalin dan menempel di Microsoft Office untuk web melalui menu memerlukan izin tambahan yang disediakan melalui ekstensi ini. 
 
 Mengaktifkan salinan dan kanan- Klik situs web yang dilindungi. 
 
 Penggunaan: 
- klik ikon tindakan browser untuk memasukkan "mode salin" untuk situs saat ini 
 Fitur: 
- buka kunci salinan (untuk nyata) 
- ingat Situs mana yang harus dibatalkan untuk kunjungan mendatang 
 
 ---> Setelah ekstensi ini diinstal, Anda harus memuat ulang tab terbuka apa pun agar berfungsi <--- 
 
 ---> Jika Anda Ubah Pengaturan Ekstensi Setiap tab terbuka harus dimuat ulang agar mereka dapat berlaku <---- 
 
 Pastikan untuk memuat ulang halaman web setelah menginstal ekstensi ini. 
 
-karena kebutuhan ekstensi kebutuhan ekstensi Untuk mengetahui tab aktif, sehingga izin dasar yang dibutuhkannya adalah "tab". Tetapi Chrome akan menyebutnya sebagai "dapat membaca dan mengubah semua data Anda di situs web yang Anda kunjungi" sambil meminta izin. Ekstensi ini tidak melacak atau menggunakan riwayat penelusuran Anda dengan cara apa pun. Satu -satunya informasi yang dibutuhkan adalah keadaan aktif dari tab. 
 
 Salin & Tempel ekstensi Pro "Aktifkan klik kanan" adalah solusi untuk situs web yang memblokir salin, tempel, pilih teks dan klik kanan.

Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:
- Click browser action icon to enter "copy mode" for current site
Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. A causa delle limitazioni dei browser web, la copia e incolla in Microsoft Office per il web attraverso i menu richiede autorizzazioni aggiuntive che sono fornite da questa estensione.

Caratteristiche:
- Sblocca la copia (vera)
- Ricorda quale sito sbloccare per future visite

ASSICURATI DI RICARICARE LA PAGINA WEB DOPO AVER INSTALLATO QUESTA ESTENSIONE .

- Poiché l'estensione deve conoscere le schede attive, quindi l'autorizzazione di base di cui ha bisogno è "schede". Ma Chrome lo etichetterà come "può leggere e modificare tutti i tuoi dati sui siti Web che visiti" mentre chiederà l'autorizzazione. Questa estensione non traccia o utilizza la cronologia di navigazione in alcun modo. L'unica informazione di cui ha bisogno sono gli stati attivi delle schede. 

L'estensione Copy&Paste Pro "Enable Right Click" è una soluzione per i siti Web che bloccano Copia, Incolla, Seleziona Testo e Clic destro.

- Questa estensione funziona separatamente per ogni scheda.
- Fare clic sull'icona dell'estensione per abilitarla / disabilitarla.
- L'estensione viene disabilitata al ricaricamento della pagina. 
- Controllare lo stato abilitato (spunta verde) o disabilitato (spunta grigia) dell'estensione nella barra degli strumenti (angolo in alto a destra).
 Abilita clic destro - Limitare Copia/Selezione è un'applicazione che consente agli utenti di tagliare, copiare e incollare tramite le barre degli strumenti del pulsante destro del tasto destro e fare il pulsante destro del mouse quando si utilizza Office sul Web. L'installazione di questa estensione gratuita consente di abilitare la copia, consentire la copia, fare clic con il tasto destro, la copia semplice, abilitare il clic destro, limitare la copia, il menu contestuale e consentire la copia e l'incollaggio in Microsoft Office per il Web attraverso i menu. Questa estensione funziona in modo indipendente per ogni scheda; Facendo clic sull'icona di estensione lo abiliterà/disabiliterà. L'estensione viene disabilitata nella pagina ricarica; Controllare lo stato abilitato (zecca verde) o disabilitato (tick grigio) dell'estensione sulla barra degli strumenti (angolo in alto a destra). 
 
 A causa delle limitazioni dei browser Web, la copia e l'incollaggio in Microsoft Office per il Web attraverso i menu richiedono autorizzazioni aggiuntive fornite attraverso questa estensione. Sblocca la copia (per reale) e ricorda quali siti sblocca per visite future. Questa estensione non traccia o utilizza la cronologia di navigazione in alcun modo; L'unica informazione di cui ha bisogno sono gli stati attivi delle schede. 
 
 Assicurati di ricaricare la pagina Web dopo aver installato questa estensione; Se si modificano le impostazioni, qualsiasi scheda aperta deve essere ricaricata affinché possano avere effetto. Poiché l'estensione deve conoscere le schede attive, quindi l'autorizzazione di base richiede è "schede". Tuttavia, Chrome lo etichetterà come "può leggere e modificare tutti i tuoi dati sui siti Web che visiti" mentre chiedi il permesso. Presentazione dell'estensione indispensabile: "Abilita il clic destro - Limitare Copia/Seleziona" 
 
 Sei stanco delle limitazioni imposte dai browser Web quando si tratta di copiare e incollare in Microsoft Office per il Web? Non guardare oltre! Con l'estensione gratuita, "Abilita clic destro: limitare la copia/seleziona", ora puoi scatenare il pieno potenziale delle funzioni di copia e incolla. 
 
 Questa potente estensione ti garantisce la possibilità di tagliare, copiare e incollare Usando senza sforzo i menu del tasto destro e la barra degli strumenti del nastro mentre si lavora con Office sul Web. Dì addio alle restrizioni frustranti e ciao alla produttività senza soluzione di continuità. 
 
 "Abilita clic destro - limitare la copia/seleziona" funziona in modo indipendente per ogni scheda, dandoti il controllo completo sulla tua esperienza di copia. Basta fare clic sull'icona di estensione per abilitarla o disabilitarla. Troverai lo stato dell'estensione che viene visualizzata comodamente sulla barra degli strumenti nell'angolo in alto a destra: un segno di spunta verde indica abilitato, mentre un segno di spunta grigio indica disabili. Bene, a causa di alcune limitazioni inerenti ai browser Web, sono necessarie autorizzazioni aggiuntive per la copia e incollaggio in Microsoft Office per il Web attraverso i menu. Qui è dove "Abilita clic destro - Limitare Copia/Seleziona" è utile. Sblocca la vera potenza della copia (in realtà) e ricorda persino quali siti sblocca per le visite future. State tranquilli, questa estensione rispetta la tua privacy non monitorando o utilizzando la cronologia della navigazione in alcun modo. Tutto ciò di cui ha bisogno è la conoscenza delle tue schede attive. 
 
 Per goderti appieno i vantaggi di questa estensione, assicurati di ricaricare la pagina Web dopo l'installazione. Se si apportano modifiche alle impostazioni, ricorda che tutte le schede aperte devono essere ricaricate per avere effetto. Chrome può richiedere l'autorizzazione etichettata come "può leggere e modificare tutti i dati sui siti Web che visiti", ma non temere - è semplicemente perché l'estensione ha bisogno di accesso per sapere quali schede sono attive. 
 
 sperimenta un livello completamente nuovo di Convenienza ed efficienza con "Abilita clic destro: limitare la copia/selezione". Non lasciare che le restrizioni del browser ti trattengano: autorizzati a copiare, incollare e conquistare con facilità. Presentazione della soluzione di copia e incolla definitiva: abilitare il clic destro - limitare la copia/select 
 
 Sei stanco di essere limitato dalla copia e incolla su Microsoft Office per il Web? Non guardare oltre! Con l'estensione gratuita, "Abilita clic destro: limitare la copia/seleziona", ora è possibile sbloccare la potenza di taglio, copia e incolla attraverso i menu del tasto destro del mouse e la barra degli strumenti del nastro. 
 
 Questa incredibile estensione fornisce le autorizzazioni aggiuntive necessarie per consentire la copia e l'incollaggio in Microsoft Office per il Web. Dì addio ai limiti frustranti e ciao alla produttività senza soluzione di continuità. 
 
 Una delle caratteristiche straordinarie di Abilita clic destro: limitare la copia/selezione è la sua capacità di lavorare in modo indipendente per ogni scheda. Basta fare clic sull'icona di estensione per abilitarla o disabilitarla. Inoltre, non dovrai mai preoccuparti di perdere le impostazioni poiché l'estensione si disabilita automaticamente nel ricarico di pagina. Tieni d'occhio lo stato dell'estensione con una rapida occhiata alla barra degli strumenti nell'angolo in alto a destra. 
 
 Comprendiamo che i browser Web hanno i loro limiti quando si tratta di copiare e incollare in Microsoft Office per il Web. Ecco perché questa estensione è qui per salvare la giornata. Sblocca la funzionalità di copia in modo da poter davvero scatenare il potenziale di produttività. E non preoccuparti, abilita il clic destro: limita la copia/seleziona rispetta la tua privacy non monitorando o utilizzando la cronologia di navigazione in alcun modo. Richiede solo l'accesso agli stati attivi delle schede. 
 
 Per garantire un funzionamento regolare, ricordati di ricaricare la tua pagina web dopo aver installato questa estensione che cambia il gioco. Se si apportano modifiche alle impostazioni, assicurati di ricaricare tutte le schede aperte per avere effetto. Chrome può richiedere l'autorizzazione etichettata come "può leggere e modificare tutti i tuoi dati sui siti Web che visiti", ma stai certo che è semplicemente necessario sapere quali schede sono attive. 
 
 Dì addio per copiare le restrizioni e ciao a un insieme Nuovo livello di produttività con Abilita clic destro: limitare la copia/selezione. Non perdere questa estensione indispensabile che rivoluzionerà il modo in cui lavori in Microsoft Office per il Web. Preparati a scatenare il potere di copia e incolla come mai prima. "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

保護されたWebサイトでのコピーと右クリックを有効にします。

拡張機能をインストールした後は、必ずウェブページを再読み込みしてください。

이 무료 확장 기능을 설치하면 Office 웹에서 오른쪽 버튼 메뉴 및 리본 도구 모음을 사용하여 잘라내기, 복사하기 및 붙여넣기를 할 수 있습니다.

웹 브라우저의 제한으로 인해 Microsoft Office for the web의 메뉴를 통해 복사하고 붙여넣기를 하기 위해서는 이 확장 기능을 통해 제공되는 추가 권한이 필요합니다.

보호된 웹 사이트에서 복사 및 오른쪽 클릭을 활성화합니다.

사용 방법 :
- 브라우저 작업 아이콘을 클릭하여 현재 사이트의 "copy mode"를 입력합니다.
기능 :
- Copy (for real)을 해제합니다.
- 미래 방문을 위해 어느 사이트를 해제할 것인지 기억합니다.

--->이 확장 기능을 설치한 후, 작동하기 위해 열려 있는 모든 탭을 다시 로드해야합니다. <---

--->확장 기능의 설정을 변경하면, 작동하기 위해 열려 있는 모든 탭은 다시 로드해야합니다. <----

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- 확장 기능은 활성 탭을 알기 위해 기본 권한이 필요하기 때문에 "tabs"가 필요합니다. 그러나 Chrome은 "visit websites you visit" data all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs.

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click"은 Copy, Paste, Select Text, Right clicks을 block(=block) 하고 있는 웹 사이트(=websites) 를 위한 solution(=solution) 입니다.

-이 extension(=extension)은 tab(=tab) 마다 separately(=separately) 독립(=independently) 동(=work) 작(=operate) 합(=do) 니(=does) 다(=it).
- extension icon(=icon) click(=clicking) on the extension icon will enable/disable it .
- extension page reload on page reload . disabled get (=gets).
- status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension toolbar (top right corner). check the status enabled (green tick).
 오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 웹에서 사무실을 사용할 때 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하여 메뉴를 자르고 복사하고 붙여 넣을 수있는 응용 프로그램입니다. 이 무료 확장자를 설치하면 복사를 활성화하고 복사, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 복사, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고, 복사, 상황에 맞는 메뉴를 제한하고 Microsoft Office에서 메뉴를 통해 웹을 복사하고 붙여 넣을 수 있습니다. 이 확장은 각 탭마다 독립적으로 작동합니다. 확장자 아이콘을 클릭하면 활성화/비활성화됩니다. 페이지를 다시로드하면 연장이 비활성화됩니다. 도구 모음 (오른쪽 상단)의 확장자의 상태 (녹색 진드기) 또는 비활성화 (회색 진드기)를 확인하십시오. 
 
 웹 브라우저의 제한으로 인해 메뉴를 통한 웹에 대한 Microsoft Office의 복사 및 붙여 넣기에는이 확장을 통해 제공되는 추가 권한이 필요합니다. 사본을 잠금 해제하고 (실제) 잠금을 해제하고 향후 방문을 위해 차단 해제 할 사이트를 기억합니다. 이 확장은 어떤 식 으로든 탐색 기록을 추적하거나 사용하지 않습니다. 필요한 유일한 정보는 탭의 활성 상태입니다. 
 
이 확장자를 설치 한 후 웹 페이지를 다시로드하십시오. 설정을 변경하면 발효하려면 열기 탭을 다시로드해야합니다. 확장자는 활성 탭을 알아야하므로 필요한 기본 권한은 "탭"입니다. 그러나 Chrome은 허가를 요청하면서 "방문하는 웹 사이트의 모든 데이터를 읽고 변경할 수 있습니다"라고 표시합니다. 필수 연장 소개 : "오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 복사 제한/선택"
 
 웹 브라우저에서 웹 브라우저가 부과하는 제한 사항이 웹을 위해 Microsoft Office에서 복사하고 붙여 넣을 때 피곤합니까? 더 이상 보지 마십시오! "오른쪽 클릭 - 오른쪽 클릭 - 사본 제한"을 사용하면 사본 및 붙여 넣기 기능의 잠재력을 최대한 발휘할 수 있습니다. 
 
이 강력한 확장자는 당신에게 자르고 복사하고 붙여 넣을 수있는 능력을 부여합니다. 웹에서 사무실 작업을하는 동안 마우스 오른쪽 버튼 클릭 메뉴와 리본 도구 모음을 쉽게 사용하십시오. 실망스러운 제한에 작별 인사를하고 원활한 생산성에 인사하십시오. 
 
 "오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 사본/선택"각 탭마다 독립적으로 작동하므로 복사 경험을 완전히 제어 할 수 있습니다. 확장 아이콘을 클릭하여 활성화 또는 비활성화하기 만하면됩니다. 오른쪽 상단 모서리의 도구 모음에 편리하게 표시되는 확장 상태를 찾을 수 있습니다. 녹색 진드기는 활성화되었음을 나타냅니다. 회색 진드기는 비활성화를 나타냅니다. 
 
 그러나이 확장은 어떻게 마술을 작동합니까? 웹 브라우저에 내재 된 특정 제한 사항으로 인해 메뉴를 통해 웹을 위해 Microsoft Office의 복사 및 붙여 넣기에 추가 권한이 필요합니다. "오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 사본 제한/선택"이 편리한 곳입니다. 사본의 진정한 힘 (실제)을 잠금 해제하고 향후 방문을 위해 차단을 해제 할 사이트를 기억합니다. 이 확장은 어떤 식 으로든 탐색 기록을 추적하거나 활용하지 않음으로써 개인 정보를 존중합니다. 필요한 것은 활성 탭에 대한 지식입니다. 
 
이 확장의 이점을 완전히 즐기려면 설치 후 웹 페이지를 다시로드하십시오. 설정을 변경하는 경우 모든 열린 탭이 적용되도록 다시로드되어야합니다. Chrome은 "방문하는 웹 사이트의 모든 데이터를 읽고 변경할 수 있습니다"라는 권한을 요청할 수 있지만 두려워하지 않습니다. 단순히 확장자가 어떤 탭이 활성화되어 있는지 알기 위해 액세스 할 필요가 있기 때문입니다. 
 
 완전히 새로운 수준의 경험을 경험하십시오. "오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 복사/선택 제한"을 사용한 편의성 및 효율성. 브라우저 제한이 당신을 뒤로 잡지 못하게하십시오 - 쉽게 복사, 붙여 넣기 및 정복 할 수 있습니다. 궁극적 인 복사 및 붙여 넣기 솔루션 소개 : 오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 복사/선택 
 
 웹 용 Microsoft Office의 복사 및 붙여 넣기가 제한되는 데 지치십니까? 더 이상 보지 마십시오! "오른쪽 클릭 활성화 - 복사/선택 제한"을 사용하면 메뉴와 리본 도구 모음을 마우스 오른쪽 버튼으로 클릭하여 절단, 복사 및 붙여 넣기의 전원을 잠금 해제 할 수 있습니다. 
 
이 놀라운 확장은 웹 용 Microsoft Office에서 복사 및 붙여 넣기에 필요한 추가 권한을 제공합니다. 실망스러운 한계에 작별 인사를하고 원활한 생산성에 인사하십시오. 
 
 오른쪽 클릭 - 제한/선택의 눈에 띄는 기능 중 하나는 각 탭마다 독립적으로 작동하는 기능입니다. 확장 아이콘을 클릭하여 활성화 또는 비활성화하기 만하면됩니다. 또한 페이지를 다시로드 할 때 확장자가 자동으로 비활성화되므로 설정을 잃는 것에 대해 걱정할 필요가 없습니다. 오른쪽 상단의 도구 모음을 빠르게 눈에 띄게 눈에 띄게 주시하십시오. 
 
 웹 브라우저는 웹을 위해 Microsoft Office에서 복사 및 붙여 넣을 때 제한 사항이 있음을 이해합니다. 그렇기 때문에이 확장이 하루를 절약하기 위해 여기에 있습니다. 복사 기능을 잠금 해제하므로 생산성 잠재력을 진정으로 발휘할 수 있습니다. 또한 걱정하지 마십시오. 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하십시오 - 복사/선택은 어떤 식 으로든 브라우징 기록을 추적하거나 사용하여 개인 정보를 존중합니다. 탭의 활성 상태에만 액세스해야합니다. 
 
 원활한 작동을 보장하려면이 게임 변경 확장을 설치 한 후 웹 페이지를 다시로드해야합니다. 설정을 변경하는 경우 모든 열린 탭을 다시로드하여 적용하십시오. Chrome은 "방문하는 웹 사이트의 모든 데이터를 읽고 변경할 수 있습니다"로 표시된 권한을 요청할 수 있지만, 어떤 탭이 활성화되어 있는지 알아야한다는 것을 확신합니다. 
 
 제한 사항을 복사하고 전체에 인사하는 작별 인사를하십시오. 사용 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하여 새로운 수준의 생산성 - 복사/선택을 제한하십시오. 웹 용 Microsoft Office에서 일하는 방식을 혁신 할 수있는이 필수 연장선을 놓치지 마십시오. 전례없는 것처럼 복사 및 붙여 넣기의 힘을 발휘할 준비를하십시오. 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 복사 활성화, 복사 허용, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 간단한 사본, 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하고 사본 제한, 컨텍스트 메뉴, 허용 Enable Context Menu and Select, Allow select, Allow copy, Allow right click in so restricted pages.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:

Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- Since the extension needs to know the active tabs , so the basic permission it requires is "tabs" . But Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit " while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" is a solution for websites that block Copy , Paste , Select Text and Right clicks .

- Clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it .
- The extension gets disabled on page reload .

Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

Say goodbye to copy restrictions and hello to a whole new level of productivity with Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select. Don't miss out on this must-have extension that will revolutionize the way you work in Microsoft Office for the web. Get ready to unleash the power of copy and paste like never before.
long.lv:
Instalējot šo bezmaksas paplašinājumu, jums būs iespēja griezt, kopēt un ielīmēt ar labo peles pogu izvēlnēm un ribonu rīkjoslu, izmantojot Office tīmeklī. Ņemot vērā tīmekļa pārlūku ierobežojumus, kopēšana un ielīmēšana Microsoft Office tīmeklī caur izvēlnēm prasa papildu atļaujas, ko nodrošina šis paplašinājums. Atļaut kopēšanu un labās pogas noklikšķināšanu aizsargātajos tīmekļa vietnēs. Lietošana: - Noklikšķiniet uz pārlūka darbības ikonas, lai iegūtu "kopēšanas režīmu" pašreizējai vietnei. Funkcijas: - Atbloķē kopēšanu (patiesi) - Atceras, kuru vietni atbloķēt nākamajām apmeklējumiem MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION. - Kopš paplašinājumam nepieciešams zināt aktīvos cilnes, tā pamatatļauja ir "cilnes". Tomēr Chrome to nosauks par "var lasīt un mainīt visus jūsu datus tīmekļa vietnēs, kuras apmeklējat", pieprasot atļauju. Šis paplašinājums neizseko vai neizmanto jūsu pārlūkošanas vēsturi nekādā veidā. Vienīgā informācija, ko tas nepieciešams, ir aktīvo cilņu stāvoklis. Copy&Paste Pro paplašinājums "Enable Right Click" ir risinājums tiem tīmekļa vietnēm, kas bloķē Copy, Paste, Select Text un Right clicks. - Šis paplašinājums strādā atsevišķi katrā cilnē. - Noklikšķinot uz paplašinājuma ikonas, to var ieslēgt / izslēgt. - Paplašinājums tiek izslēgts lapas atsvaidzināšanas laikā. - Pārbaudiet paplašinājuma stavokli (zilais zvaigznīte) vai izslēgtu (peles zvaigznīte) rīkjoslā (augšpusē pa labi).
 Iespējot ar peles labo pogu - ierobežot kopiju/atlasīt ir lietojumprogramma, kas lietotājiem ļauj izgriezt, kopēt un ielīmēt, izmantojot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet uz izvēlnēm un lentes rīkjoslas, izmantojot biroju tīmeklī. Šī bezmaksas paplašinājuma instalēšana ļauj iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu noklikšķināt, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni un ļaut kopēt un ielīmēt Microsoft Office tīmeklī, izmantojot izvēlnes. Šis paplašinājums darbojas neatkarīgi katrai cilnei; Noklikšķinot uz paplašinājuma ikonas, to iespējot/atspējot. Paplašinājums tiek atspējots lapas atkārtotā ielādē; Pārbaudiet iespējotu statusu (zaļā ērce) vai atspējota (pelēkā ērce) no rīkjoslas paplašinājuma (augšējā labajā stūrī). 
 
 Tīmekļa pārlūkprogrammu ierobežojumu dēļ, kopēšana un ielīmēšana Microsoft birojā tīmeklī, izmantojot izvēlnes, ir vajadzīgas papildu atļaujas, kas tiek nodrošinātas ar šo paplašinājumu. Tas atbloķē kopiju (pa īstam) un atceras, kuras vietnes tiek atbloķētas turpmākajās vizītēs. Šis paplašinājums nekādā veidā neizseko un neizmanto jūsu pārlūkošanas vēsturi; Vienīgā informācija, kas tai nepieciešama, ir aktīvie cilņu stāvokļi. 
 
 Pēc šī paplašinājuma instalēšanas noteikti atkārtoti ielādējiet tīmekļa lapu; Ja maināt iestatījumus, atvērtas cilnes ir jāpārlādē, lai tās stātos spēkā. Tā kā pagarinājumam ir jāzina aktīvās cilnes, tāpēc tā nepieciešamā pamata atļauja ir "cilnes". Tomēr Chrome to apzīmēs kā "var lasīt un mainīt visus jūsu datus vietnēs, kuru apmeklējat", vienlaikus lūdzot atļauju. Iepazīstinām ar obligāto paplašinājumu: "Iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet - ierobežojiet kopēšanu/atlasiet" 
 
 Vai esat noguris no ierobežojumiem, ko noteikuši tīmekļa pārlūki, kad runa ir par tīmekļa kopēšanu un ielīmēšanu Microsoft birojā? Vairs neskaties! Izmantojot bezmaksas pagarinājumu, "Iespējot ar peles labo pogu - ierobežot kopiju/atlasīt", tagad jūs varat atlaist visu kopijas un ielīmēšanas funkciju potenciālu. 
 
 Šis jaudīgais paplašinājums piešķir jums iespēju sagriezt, kopēt un ielīmēt Bez piepūles izmantojot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet uz izvēlnēm un lentes rīkjoslu, strādājot ar Office tīmeklī. Atvadieties no neapmierinošiem ierobežojumiem un sveiks bezšuvju produktivitātei. 
 
 "Iespējot ar peles labo pogu - ierobežot kopiju/atlasīt" darbojas patstāvīgi katrai cilnei, nodrošinot pilnīgu kontroli pār savu kopēšanas pieredzi. Vienkārši noklikšķiniet uz paplašinājuma ikonas, lai to iespējotu vai atspējotu. Jūs atradīsit paplašinājuma statusu, kas ērti parādīts rīkjoslā augšējā labajā stūrī - zaļā ērce norāda iespējotu, savukārt pelēkā ērce apzīmē atspējotu. 
 
 Bet kā šis paplašinājums darbojas tā maģijā? Nu, sakarā ar noteiktiem tīmekļa pārlūkprogrammām raksturīgajiem ierobežojumiem, Microsoft birojā tīmeklī caur izvēlnēm ir vajadzīgas papildu atļaujas, lai kopētu un ielīmētu Microsoft birojā. Šeit ir noderīgs "iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet - ierobežot kopēšanu/atlasīt". Tas atbloķē kopijas patieso spēku (pa īstam) un pat atceras, kuras vietnes ir atbloķētas nākamajām vizītēm. Varat būt drošs, ka šis paplašinājums ievēro jūsu privātumu, nekādā veidā neizsekojot un neizmantojot pārlūkošanas vēsturi. Viss, kas tam nepieciešams, ir zināšanas par jūsu aktīvajām cilnēm. 
 
 Lai pilnībā izbaudītu šī paplašinājuma priekšrocības, noteikti atkārtoti ielādējiet vietni pēc instalēšanas. Ja jūs veicat izmaiņas iestatījumos, atcerieties, ka visas atvērtās cilnes ir jāpārlādē, lai tās stātos spēkā. Chrome var pieprasīt atļauju, kas apzīmēta kā "var lasīt un mainīt visus jūsu datus vietnēs, kuras apmeklējat", bet nebaidieties - tas ir vienkārši tāpēc, ka paplašinājumam ir nepieciešama piekļuve, lai zinātu, kuras cilnes ir aktīvas. 
 
 Piedzīvojiet pilnīgi jaunu līmeni Ērtība un efektivitāte ar "iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet - ierobežojiet kopēšanu/atlasiet". Neļaujiet pārlūkprogrammas ierobežojumiem jūs aizkavēt - dodiet iespēju ērti kopēt, ielīmēt un iekarot. Iepazīstināt ar galīgo kopiju un ielīmēšanas risinājumu: Iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet - ierobežojiet kopiju/atlasiet 
 
 Vai jums ir apnicis, ka jums ir ierobežots no kopēšanas un ielīmēšanas Microsoft Office tīmeklim? Vairs neskaties! Izmantojot bezmaksas paplašinājumu, "Iespējot ar peles labo pogu - ierobežot kopiju/atlasīt", tagad varat atbloķēt griezuma, kopēšanas un ielīmēšanas jaudu, izmantojot peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet uz izvēlnēm un lentes rīkjoslu. 
 
 Šis neticamais pagarinājums nodrošina papildu atļaujas, kas vajadzīgas, lai tīmeklī iespējotu kopēšanu un ielīmēšanu Microsoft birojā. Atvadieties no neapmierinošiem ierobežojumiem un sveiks bezšuvju produktivitātei. 
 
 Viena no iespējotās labās puses klikšķa atšķirīgajām funkcijām - ierobežot kopēšanu/atlasīt ir tā spēja strādāt neatkarīgi katrai cilnei. Vienkārši noklikšķiniet uz paplašinājuma ikonas, lai to iespējotu vai atspējotu. Turklāt jums nekad nebūs jāuztraucas par iestatījumu zaudēšanu, jo paplašinājums automātiski atspējo lapas atkārtotu ielādi. Sekojiet līdzi paplašinājuma statusam ar ātru skatienu uz rīkjoslu augšējā labajā stūrī. 
 
 Mēs saprotam, ka tīmekļa pārlūkprogrammām ir savi ierobežojumi, kad runa ir par tīmekļa kopēšanu un ielīmēšanu Microsoft birojā. Tāpēc šis paplašinājums ir šeit, lai ietaupītu dienu. Tas atbloķē kopēšanas funkcionalitāti, lai jūs varētu patiesi atbrīvot savu produktivitātes potenciālu. Neuztraucieties, iespējojiet ar peles labo pogu - ierobežojiet kopēšanu/atlasiet respektē jūsu privātumu, nekādā veidā neizsekojot un neizmantojot pārlūkošanas vēsturi. Tas prasa piekļuvi tikai jūsu cilņu aktīvajiem stāvokļiem. 
 
 Lai nodrošinātu vienmērīgu darbību, atcerieties pārlādēt savu vietni pēc šī spēles mainīgā paplašinājuma instalēšanas. Ja jūs veicat izmaiņas iestatījumos, noteikti atkārtoti ielādējiet visas atvērtās cilnes, lai tās varētu stāties spēkā. Chrome var pieprasīt atļauju, kas apzīmēta kā "var lasīt un mainīt visus jūsu datus vietnēs, kuras apmeklējat", taču esiet drošs, ka tas vienkārši ir nepieciešams, lai zinātu, kuras cilnes ir aktīvas. 
 
 Atvadieties no tā, lai kopētu ierobežojumus, un sveiciens veselumam veselumam. Jauns produktivitātes līmenis ar iespējošanu ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet - ierobežojiet kopēšanu/atlasiet. Nepalaidiet garām šo obligāto pagarinājumu, kas revolucionizēs to, kā jūs strādājat Microsoft birojā tīmeklim. Gatavojieties atbrīvot kopijas un ielīmēšanas spēku kā vēl nekad. Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Iespējot kopēt, atļaut kopēt, ar peles labo pogu, vienkāršs kopēt, iespējot ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet, ierobežot kopiju, konteksta izvēlni, atļaut Enable Context Menu and Select, Allow select, Allow copy, Allow right click in so restricted pages.

Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:
- Click browser action icon to enter "copy mode" for current site
Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

---> Once this extension is installed you must reload any open tabs in order for it to work<---

--->If you change the extension settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect <----

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- Since the extension needs to know the active tabs , so the basic permission it requires is "tabs" . But Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit " while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" is a solution for websites that block Copy , Paste , Select Text and Right clicks .

- This extension works separately for each tab .
- Clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it .
- The extension gets disabled on page reload .
- Check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner).
Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way.

സന്ദർഭ മെനു പ്രവർത്തനക്ഷമമാക്കി തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക, തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക, അനുവദിക്കുക, അനുവദിക്കുക അനുവദിക്കുക, അത്ര നിയന്ത്രിത പേജുകളിൽ വലത് ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യാൻ അനുവദിക്കുക. വെബ്സിലെ ഓഫീസ്. 
 
 വെബ് ബ്ര rowsers സറുകളുടെ പരിമിതികൾ കാരണം, മെനുകൾ വഴി മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിലെ പരിമിതികൾ കാരണം, ഈ വിപുലീകരണത്തിലൂടെ നൽകുന്ന അധിക അനുമതികൾ ആവശ്യമാണ്. 
 
 പകർപ്പവും വലതുപക്ഷവും പ്രവർത്തനക്ഷമമാക്കുക നിലവിലുള്ള സൈറ്റുകളിൽ പരിരക്ഷിത വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിൽ ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുക. 
 ഉപയോഗം: 
 - നിലവിലെ സൈറ്റിനായി "കോപ്പി ആക്ഷൻ ഐക്കൺ ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുക 
 സവിശേഷതകൾ: 
 - അൺലോക്ക് കോംപ്ലുകൾ (യഥാർത്ഥത്തിൽ) 
 - ഓർമ്മിക്കുന്നു ഭാവി സന്ദർശനങ്ങൾക്കായി ഏത് സൈറ്റ് തടയുന്നു വിപുലീകരണ ക്രമീകരണങ്ങൾ മാറ്റുക ഏത് ഓപ്പണ ടാബുകളും പ്രാബല്യത്തിൽ വരുത്തിവയ്ക്കേണ്ടതുണ്ട് <---- </> 
 ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ ചെയ്തതിനുശേഷം വെബ്പേജ് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യണം. 
 
 - വിപുലീകരണ ആവശ്യങ്ങൾ മുതൽ സജീവ ടാബുകൾ അറിയാൻ, അതിനാൽ ഇതിന് ആവശ്യമായ അടിസ്ഥാന അനുമതി "ടാബുകൾ" ആണ്. "നിങ്ങൾ സന്ദർശിക്കുന്ന വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിലെ നിങ്ങളുടെ എല്ലാ ഡാറ്റയും വായിക്കാനും മാറ്റാൻ കഴിയുമെന്നും ക്രോം ഇതിനെ ലേബൽ ചെയ്യും .ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഏതെങ്കിലും വിധത്തിൽ ബ്രൗസിംഗ് ചരിത്രം ട്രാക്കുചെയ്യുന്നില്ല അല്ലെങ്കിൽ ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്നത് സജീവ സംസ്ഥാനങ്ങളാണ് ഇതിന് ആവശ്യമായ വിവരങ്ങൾക്ക് ടാബുകൾ. 
 
 പകർത്തുകയും പാസ്തീയ പ്രോ വിപുലീകരണ "വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക" പകർത്തുക, പേസ്റ്റ് ചെയ്യുക, പാസ്റ്റ്, വലത് ക്ലിക്കുകൾ തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക. 
 
 - ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഓരോ ടാബിനും വേണ്ടി പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നു. 
 - ഈ വിപുലീകരണം പ്രത്യേകം പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നു. 
 - വിപുലീകരണ ഐക്കണിൽ ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുന്നത് അത് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുകയും അപ്രാപ്തമാക്കുകയും ചെയ്യും. 
 - ടൂൾബാറിലെ വിപുലീകൃത (ഗ്രീൻ ടിക്ക്) അല്ലെങ്കിൽ അപ്രാപ്തമാക്കിയ (ഗ്രേ ടിക്ക്) (ഗ്രേ ടിക്ക്) (മുകളിൽ ടിക്ക്) മൂല). 
 വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രവർത്തനക്ഷമമാക്കുക - വെബിൽ ഓഫീസ് ഉപയോഗിക്കുമ്പോൾ വലത്-ക്ലിക്ക് മെനുകൾ, റിബൺ ടൂൾബാറുകൾ എന്നിവ മുറിക്കാൻ അനുവദിക്കുന്ന ഒരു അപ്ലിക്കേഷനാണ് ഉപയോക്താക്കളെ നിയന്ത്രിക്കുക / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക. ഈ സ sublue ജന്യ വിപുലീകരണം ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ ചെയ്യുന്നത് പകർത്തുക, പകർപ്പ്, വലത് ക്ലിക്ക്, ലളിത പകർപ്പ് എന്നിവ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കാൻ നിങ്ങളെ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നു, വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് എന്നിവ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക, കൂടാതെ മെനുകൾ വഴി മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിൽ ഒട്ടിക്കാൻ അനുവദിക്കുക. ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഓരോ ടാബിനും സ്വതന്ത്രമായി പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നു; വിപുലീകരണ ഐക്കണിൽ ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുന്നത് അത് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുകയും അപ്രാപ്തമാക്കുകയും ചെയ്യും. പേജ് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യുന്നതിൽ വിപുലീകരണം അപ്രാപ്തമാകും; ടൂൾബാറിലെ (മുകളിൽ വലത് കോണിൽ) വിപുലീകരണത്തിന്റെ സ്റ്റാറ്റസ് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കി (പച്ച ടിക്ക്) അല്ലെങ്കിൽ അപ്രാപ്തമാക്കിയ (ഗ്രേ ടിക്ക്) പരിശോധിക്കുക. 
 
 വെബ് ബ്ര rowsers സറുകളുടെ പരിമിതികൾ കാരണം, മെനുകൾ വഴി മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിൽ പകർത്തുകയും ഒട്ടിക്കുകയും കാരണം ഈ വിപുലീകരണത്തിലൂടെ നൽകുന്ന അധിക അനുമതികൾ ആവശ്യമാണ്. ഇത് പകർപ്പ് (യഥാർത്ഥമായി) അൺലോക്ക് ചെയ്ത് ഭാവിയിലെ സന്ദർശനങ്ങൾക്ക് തടഞ്ഞത് മാറ്റാൻ ഓർമ്മിക്കുന്നു. ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഏതെങ്കിലും വിധത്തിൽ നിങ്ങളുടെ ബ്ര rows സിംഗ് ചരിത്രം ട്രാക്കുചെയ്യുകയോ ഉപയോഗിക്കുകയോ ചെയ്യുന്നില്ല; ഇതിന് ആവശ്യമായ ഒരേയൊരു വിവരങ്ങൾ ടാബുകളുടെ സജീവ സംസ്ഥാനങ്ങളാണ്. 
 
 ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ ചെയ്തതിനുശേഷം വെബ്പേജ് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യുന്നത് ഉറപ്പാക്കുക; നിങ്ങൾ ക്രമീകരണങ്ങൾ മാറ്റുകയാണെങ്കിൽ അവ പ്രാബല്യത്തിൽ വരുന്നതിനായി ഏതെങ്കിലും ഓപ്പൺ ടാബുകൾ വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യണം. വിപുലീകരണത്തിന് സജീവ ടാബുകൾ അറിയേണ്ടതുണ്ട്, അതിനാൽ ഇതിന് ആവശ്യമായ അടിസ്ഥാന അനുമതി "ടാബുകൾ" എന്നാണ്. എന്നിരുന്നാലും, അനുമതി ചോദിക്കുമ്പോൾ നിങ്ങൾ സന്ദർശിക്കുന്ന വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിലെ എല്ലാ ഡാറ്റയും വായിക്കാനും മാറ്റാനും കഴിയും "എന്ന് Chrome ഇതിന് ലേബൽ ചെയ്യും. ചെയ്യേണ്ട വിപുലീകരണം അവതരിപ്പിക്കുന്നു: "വലത് ക്ലിക്കുകൾ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക - പകർത്തുക / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക" ഉപയോഗിക്കുക "
 കൂടുതൽ നോക്കുക! സ്വതന്ത്ര വിപുലീകരണത്തോടെ, "വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക / പകർത്തുക / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക," നിങ്ങളുടെ പകർപ്പിന്റെ പേസ്റ്റ് പ്രവർത്തനങ്ങളുടെ മുഴുവൻ സാധ്യതയും നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഇപ്പോൾ അഴിച്ചുമാറ്റാൻ കഴിയും. 
 
 വെബിലെ ഓഫീസിലെ ഓഫീസിൽ ജോലി ചെയ്യുമ്പോൾ വലത്-ക്ലിക്ക് മെനുകൾ, റിബൺ ടൂൾബാർ എന്നിവയും റിബൺ ടൂൾബാർ ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്നു. നിരാശാജനകമായ നിയന്ത്രണങ്ങളെയും തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത ഉൽപാദനക്ഷമതയിലേക്കും വിട പറയുക. 
 
 "വലത് ക്ലിക്കുകൾ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക - പകർത്തുക / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക ഓരോ ടാബിനും ഇത് സ്വതന്ത്രമായി പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നു, നിങ്ങളുടെ പകർത്തൽ അനുഭവത്തിൽ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് പൂർണ്ണ നിയന്ത്രണം നൽകുന്നു. അത് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നതിനോ അപ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നതിനോ ഉള്ള വിപുലീകരണ ഐക്കണിൽ ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുക. മുകളിൽ വലത് കോണിലുള്ള ടൂൾബാറിൽ സൗകര്യപ്രദമായി വിപുലീകരണത്തിന്റെ നില നിങ്ങൾക്ക് കണ്ടെത്തും - ഒരു പച്ച ടിക്ക് പ്രവർത്തനക്ഷമമാക്കി, ഒരു ഗ്രേ ടിക്ക് പ്രവർത്തനക്ഷമമാക്കി. വെബ് ബ്ര rowsers സറുകൾക്ക് അന്തർലീനമായ ചില പരിമിതികൾ കാരണം, മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിൽ മെനുകൾ വഴി പകർത്തുന്നതിനും ഒട്ടിക്കുന്നതിനും അധിക അനുമതികൾ ആവശ്യമാണ്. ഇവിടെയാണ് "വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക - പകർപ്പ് / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക" നിയന്ത്രിക്കുക "ഉപയോഗപ്രദമാണ്. ഇത് ശരിയായ പകർപ്പ് (യഥാർത്ഥമായി) അൺലോട്ട് ചെയ്യുന്നു, ഭാവി സന്ദർശനങ്ങൾക്കായി അൺലോട്ട് ചെയ്യാനുള്ള സൈറ്റുകൾ ഓർമ്മിക്കുന്നു. ഉറപ്പുള്ള, ഈ വിപുലീകരണം നിങ്ങളുടെ സ്വകാര്യതയെ ഏതെങ്കിലും വിധത്തിൽ ട്രാക്കുചെയ്യുകയോ ഉപയോഗിക്കുകയോ ചെയ്യുന്നില്ല. നിങ്ങളുടെ സജീവമായ ടാബുകളുടെ അറിവാണ് ഇതിന് വേണ്ടത്. 
 
 ഈ വിപുലീകരണത്തിന്റെ ആനുകൂല്യങ്ങൾ പൂർണ്ണമായും ആസ്വദിക്കാൻ, ഇൻസ്റ്റാളേഷന് ശേഷം വെബ്പേജ് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യുന്നത് ഉറപ്പാക്കുക. ക്രമീകരണങ്ങളിൽ എന്തെങ്കിലും മാറ്റങ്ങൾ വരുത്തുകയാണെങ്കിൽ, അവ എല്ലാ ഓപ്പൺ ടാബുകളും പ്രാബല്യത്തിൽ വരുമെന്ന് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യണമെന്ന് ഓർമ്മിക്കുക. "നിങ്ങൾ സന്ദർശിക്കുന്ന വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിലെ നിങ്ങളുടെ എല്ലാ ഡാറ്റയും വായിക്കാനും മാറ്റാനും കഴിയും" എന്ന് ലേബൽ ചെയ്ത അനുമതി "എന്നാൽ - ഒരു ടാബുകൾ സജീവമാണെന്ന് അറിയാൻ ആക്സസ്സുചെയ്യാനാകുന്നതിനാലാണിത്. 
 
 ഒരു പുതിയ ലെവൽ അനുഭവിക്കുക "വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക - പകർപ്പ് / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക." ബ്ര browser സർ നിയന്ത്രണങ്ങളെ നിങ്ങളെ തടഞ്ഞുനിർത്താൻ അനുവദിക്കരുത് - പകർത്തുക, ഒട്ടിക്കുക, അനായാസം കീഴടക്കാൻ സ്വയം ശാക്തീകരിക്കുക. ആത്യന്തിക പകർപ്പും പേസ്റ്റും അവതരിപ്പിക്കുന്നു: വലത് ക്ലിക്കുകൾ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക - പകർത്തുക / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക. കൂടുതൽ നോക്കുക! സ്വതന്ത്ര വിപുലീകരണത്തോടെ, "വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുക - പകർപ്പ് / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക" നിയന്ത്രിക്കുക, വലത്-ക്ലിക്ക് മെനുകൾ, റിബൺ ടൂൾബാർ എന്നിവയിലൂടെ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഇപ്പോൾ അൺലോക്കുചെയ്യാനാകും, പകർത്തുക, ഒട്ടിക്കുക. 
 
 വെബിനായി മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിൽ പകർത്തുകയും ഒട്ടിക്കുക പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നതിന് ആവശ്യമായ അധിക അനുമതികൾ ഈ അവിശ്വസനീയമായ വിപുലീകരണം നൽകുന്നു. നിരാശപ്പെടുത്തുന്ന പരിമിതികളെയും തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത ഉൽപാദനക്ഷമതയിലേക്കും ഹലോ ചെയ്യാൻ പറയുക. 
 
 വലത് ക്ലിക്കിന്റെ ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾട്ട് സവിശേഷതകളിലൊന്ന് - പകർപ്പ് / സെലക്ട് നിയന്ത്രിക്കുക, ഓരോ ടാബിനും സ്വതന്ത്രമായി പ്രവർത്തിക്കാനുള്ള കഴിവാണ്. അത് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നതിനോ അപ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നതിനോ ഉള്ള വിപുലീകരണ ഐക്കണിൽ ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുക. കൂടാതെ, നിങ്ങളുടെ ക്രമീകരണങ്ങൾ നഷ്ടപ്പെടുന്നതിനെക്കുറിച്ച് നിങ്ങൾ ഒരിക്കലും വിഷമിക്കേണ്ടതില്ല, കാരണം വിപുലീകരണം യാന്ത്രികമായി പേജ് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യുന്നു. മുകളിൽ വലത് കോണിലുള്ള ടൂൾബാറിൽ സൂക്ഷ്മമായി നോട്ടം ഉപയോഗിച്ച് വിപുലീകരണത്തിന്റെ അവസ്ഥയിൽ സൂക്ഷിക്കുക. 
 
 വെബിനായി മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിൽ പകർത്തുന്നതിനും ഒട്ടിക്കുന്നതിനും വെബ് ബ്ര rowsers സറുകൾക്ക് അവരുടെ പരിമിതികൾ ഉണ്ടെന്ന് ഞങ്ങൾ മനസ്സിലാക്കുന്നു. അതുകൊണ്ടാണ് ദിവസം ലാഭിക്കേണ്ടത് ഈ വിപുലീകരണം ഇവിടെയുള്ളത്. ഇത് അൺലോക്ക്ലോക്ക് പ്രവർത്തനം അൺലോക്ക് ചെയ്യുന്നു, അതിനാൽ നിങ്ങളുടെ ഉൽപാദനക്ഷമത സാധ്യതകൾ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ശരിക്കും അഴിക്കാൻ കഴിയും. വിഷമിക്കേണ്ട, വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രവർത്തനക്ഷമമാക്കുക - പകർത്തുക / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക നിങ്ങളുടെ സ്വകാര്യതയെ ഏതെങ്കിലും വിധത്തിൽ ട്രാക്കുചെയ്യുകയോ ഉപയോഗിക്കുകയോ ചെയ്തിട്ടില്ല. നിങ്ങളുടെ ടാബുകളുടെ സജീവ സംസ്ഥാനങ്ങളിലേക്ക് ആക്സസ് മാത്രമേ ആവശ്യമുള്ളൂ. 
 
 സുഗമമായ പ്രവർത്തനം ഉറപ്പാക്കുന്നതിന്, ഈ ഗെയിം മാറ്റുന്ന വിപുലീകരണം ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ ചെയ്ത ശേഷം നിങ്ങളുടെ വെബ്പേജ് വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യാൻ ഓർമ്മിക്കുക. ക്രമീകരണങ്ങളിൽ എന്തെങ്കിലും മാറ്റങ്ങൾ വരുത്തുകയാണെങ്കിൽ, അവ പ്രാബല്യത്തിൽ വരാൻ എല്ലാ ഓപ്പൺ ടാബുകളും വീണ്ടും ലോഡുചെയ്യുന്നത് ഉറപ്പാക്കുക. "നിങ്ങൾ സന്ദർശിക്കുന്ന വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിലെ നിങ്ങളുടെ എല്ലാ ഡാറ്റയും വായിക്കാനും മാറ്റാനും കഴിയും" എന്ന് ലേബൽ ചെയ്ത അനുമതി ", ഏത് ടാബുകൾ സജീവമാണെന്ന് അറിയേണ്ടത് ആവശ്യമാണെന്ന് ഉറപ്പുനൽകുന്നു. 
 
 നിയന്ത്രണങ്ങളും ഹലോയും വലത് ക്ലിക്ക് പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്ന ഉൽപാദനക്ഷമതയുടെ പുതിയ ലെവൽ - പകർപ്പ് / തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക. വെബിനായി നിങ്ങൾ മൈക്രോസോഫ്റ്റ് ഓഫീസിൽ ജോലി ചെയ്യുന്ന രീതിയിൽ വിപ്ലവം സൃഷ്ടിക്കുന്ന വിപുലീകരണങ്ങൾ നഷ്ടപ്പെടുത്തരുത്. മുമ്പൊരിക്കലും ഇതുപോലെ പകർപ്പിന്റെയും പേറ്ററിന്റെയും പവർ അഴിക്കാൻ തയ്യാറാകുക. enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, allow
