Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

 Pastikan untuk memuatkan semula laman web setelah memasang pelanjutan ini. Untuk mengetahui tab aktif, jadi kebenaran asas yang diperlukan adalah "tab". Tetapi Chrome akan melabelnya sebagai "boleh membaca dan menukar semua data anda di laman web yang anda lawati" sambil meminta kebenaran.  Extension Copy & Paste Pro "Dayakan Klik Kanan" adalah penyelesaian untuk laman web yang menyekat salinan, tampal, pilih teks dan klik kanan. 
 
- lanjutan ini berfungsi secara berasingan untuk setiap tab.

 Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salin/Pilih adalah aplikasi yang membolehkan pengguna memotong, menyalin, dan tampal melalui menu klik kanan dan bar alat reben apabila menggunakan pejabat di web. Memasang pelanjutan percuma ini membolehkan anda mengaktifkan salinan, biarkan salinan, klik kanan, salinan mudah, aktifkan klik kanan, hadkan salinan, menu konteks, dan membolehkan menyalin dan menampal di Microsoft Office untuk web melalui menu. Pelanjutan ini berfungsi secara bebas untuk setiap tab; Mengklik pada ikon pelanjutan akan membolehkan/melumpuhkannya. Pelanjutan akan dilumpuhkan pada halaman tambah nilai; Semak status yang diaktifkan (tanda hijau) atau dilumpuhkan (tanda kelabu) lanjutan pada bar alat (sudut kanan atas). 
 
 Oleh kerana batasan pelayar web, menyalin dan menampal di Microsoft Office untuk web melalui menu memerlukan kebenaran tambahan yang disediakan melalui lanjutan ini. Ia membuka kunci salinan (untuk sebenar) dan mengingati laman web yang akan dibatalkan untuk lawatan masa depan. Pelanjutan ini tidak menjejaki atau menggunakan sejarah penyemakan imbas anda dengan apa -apa cara; Satu -satunya maklumat yang diperlukan ialah keadaan aktif tab. 
 
 Pastikan untuk memuatkan semula laman web selepas memasang pelanjutan ini; Jika anda menukar tetapan mana -mana tab terbuka mesti dimuat semula agar mereka berkuatkuasa. Oleh kerana pelanjutan perlu mengetahui tab aktif, jadi kebenaran asas yang diperlukan adalah "tab". Walau bagaimanapun, Chrome akan melabelkannya sebagai "boleh membaca dan menukar semua data anda di laman web yang anda lawati" sambil meminta kebenaran. Memperkenalkan lanjutan mesti ada: "Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salin/Pilih" 
 
 Adakah anda bosan dengan batasan yang dikenakan oleh pelayar web ketika datang untuk menyalin dan menampal di Microsoft Office untuk web? Lihat lagi! Dengan pelanjutan percuma, "Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salin/Pilih," Anda kini boleh melepaskan potensi penuh fungsi salinan dan tampal anda. Dengan mudah menggunakan menu klik kanan dan bar alat reben semasa bekerja dengan pejabat di web. Katakan selamat tinggal kepada sekatan yang mengecewakan dan hello kepada produktiviti yang lancar. Cukup klik pada ikon lanjutan untuk membolehkan atau melumpuhkannya. Anda akan menemui status pelanjutan yang dipaparkan dengan mudah di bar alat di sudut kanan atas - tanda hijau menunjukkan diaktifkan, sementara tanda kelabu menandakan dilumpuhkan. 
 
 Tetapi bagaimana lanjutan ini berfungsi sihirnya? Nah, disebabkan oleh batasan -batasan tertentu yang wujud untuk pelayar web, kebenaran tambahan diperlukan untuk menyalin dan menampal di Microsoft Office untuk web melalui menu. Di sinilah "Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salinan/Pilih" berguna. Ia membuka kunci kuasa salinan sebenar (untuk sebenar) dan juga mengingati tapak yang akan menyahsekat untuk lawatan masa depan. Yakinlah, lanjutan ini menghormati privasi anda dengan tidak menjejaki atau menggunakan sejarah penyemakan imbas anda dengan apa -apa cara. Apa yang diperlukan adalah pengetahuan tentang tab aktif anda. Jika anda membuat sebarang perubahan pada tetapan, ingatlah bahawa semua tab terbuka mesti dimuat semula untuk mereka berkuatkuasa. Chrome boleh meminta kebenaran yang dilabelkan sebagai "boleh membaca dan menukar semua data anda di laman web yang anda lawati," tetapi jangan takut - itu semata -mata kerana lanjutan memerlukan akses untuk mengetahui tab yang aktif. 
 
 Kemudahan dan kecekapan dengan "Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salin/Pilih." Jangan biarkan sekatan penyemak imbas menahan anda - memberi kuasa kepada anda untuk menyalin, tampal, dan menakluk dengan mudah. Memperkenalkan Penyelesaian Salinan dan Tampal Terbaik: Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salinan/Pilih 
 
 Adakah anda bosan dengan disalin dari menyalin dan menampal di Microsoft Office untuk Web? Lihat lagi! Dengan pelanjutan percuma, "Dayakan Klik Kanan - Hadkan Salin/Pilih", kini anda boleh membuka kunci kuasa pemotongan, salin, dan tampal melalui menu klik kanan dan bar alat reben. 
 
 Lanjutan yang luar biasa ini memberikan keizinan tambahan yang diperlukan untuk membolehkan menyalin dan menampal di Microsoft Office untuk web. Ucapkan selamat tinggal kepada batasan yang mengecewakan dan salam produktiviti yang lancar. 
 
 Salah satu ciri yang menonjol untuk membolehkan klik kanan - Hadkan salinan/pilih adalah keupayaannya untuk bekerja secara bebas untuk setiap tab. Cukup klik pada ikon lanjutan untuk membolehkan atau melumpuhkannya. Selain itu, anda tidak perlu risau tentang kehilangan tetapan anda kerana pelanjutan secara automatik melumpuhkan dirinya apabila dimuat semula. Perhatikan status lanjutan dengan pandangan cepat di bar alat di sudut kanan atas. Itulah sebabnya lanjutan ini ada di sini untuk menyelamatkan hari. Ia membuka kunci fungsi salinan supaya anda benar -benar boleh melepaskan potensi produktiviti anda. Dan jangan risau, aktifkan klik kanan - Hadkan Salin/Pilih Hormati privasi anda dengan tidak menjejaki atau menggunakan sejarah pelayaran anda dengan apa -apa cara. Ia hanya memerlukan akses ke keadaan aktif tab anda. Jika anda membuat sebarang perubahan pada tetapan, pastikan anda memuatkan semula semua tab terbuka untuk mereka berkuatkuasa. Chrome boleh meminta kebenaran yang dilabelkan sebagai "boleh membaca dan menukar semua data anda di laman web yang anda lawati", tetapi yakinlah bahawa ia hanya perlu mengetahui tab yang aktif. 
 
 Tahap produktiviti baru dengan membolehkan klik kanan - Hadkan salinan/pilih. Jangan ketinggalan lanjutan ini mesti merevolusikan cara anda bekerja di Microsoft Office untuk web. Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:
- Click browser action icon to enter "copy mode" for current site
Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

---> Once this extension is installed you must reload any open tabs in order for it to work<---

--->If you change the extension settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect <----

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- Since the extension needs to know the active tabs , so the basic permission it requires is "tabs" . But Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit " while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" is a solution for websites that block Copy , Paste , Select Text and Right clicks .

- This extension works separately for each tab .
- Clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it .
- The extension gets disabled on page reload .
- Check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner).
Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

Say goodbye to copy restrictions and hello to a whole new level of productivity with Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select. Don't miss out on this must-have extension that will revolutionize the way you work in Microsoft Office for the web. Get ready to unleash the power of copy and paste like never before.

Schakel kopiëren en rechtermuisklikken in op beveiligde websites.

- Klik op het pictogram van de browseractie om "kopiemodus" in te schakelen voor de huidige site
Kenmerken:
- Ontgrendelt kopiëren (voor echt)
- Onthoudt welke site moet worden ontgrendeld voor toekomstige bezoeken

---> Nadat deze extensie is geïnstalleerd, moet u alle geopende tabbladen herladen om deze te laten werken <---

---> Als u de instellingen van de extensie wijzigt, moeten alle geopende tabbladen worden herladen om de wijzigingen toe te passen <----

ZORG ERVOOR DAT U DE WEBPAGINA HERLAADT NA HET INSTALLEREN VAN DEZE EXTENSIE.

- Aangezien de extensie moet weten welke actieve tabbladen er zijn, is de basismachtiging die het nodig heeft "tabbladen". Maar Chrome zal het labelleren als "kan alle gegevens op websites die je bezoekt lezen en wijzigen" terwijl je om toestemming vraagt. Deze extensie volgt of gebruikt je surfgeschiedenis op geen enkele manier. De enige informatie die hij nodig heeft, is de actieve status van de tabbladen. 

De Copy & Paste Pro-extensie "Enable Right Click" is een oplossing voor websites die kopiëren, plakken, selecteren van tekst en rechtermuisklikken blokkeren. 

- Deze extensie werkt afzonderlijk voor elk tabblad. 
- Door op het pictogram van de extensie te klikken, wordt deze ingeschakeld / uitgeschakeld. 
- De extensie wordt uitgeschakeld bij het herladen van de pagina. 
- Controleer de status ingeschakeld (groene vink) of uitgeschakeld (grijze vink) van de extensie in de werkbalk (rechtsboven).

Omdat de extensie de actieve tabbladen moet kennen, is de basisvergunning die het vereist "tabbladen". Introductie van de must -have extensie: "Rechtklik inschakelen - Beperk kopiëren/selecteren" 
 
 Bent u de beperkingen beu die opgelegd door webbrowsers wordt opgelegd als het gaat om kopiëren en plakken in Microsoft Office voor het web? Zoek niet verder! Met de gratis extensie, "Klik met de rechtermuisknop inschakelen - Kopiëren/selecteren beperken", kunt u nu het volledige potentieel van uw kopie- en plakfuncties loslaten. 
 
 Deze krachtige extensie verleent u de mogelijkheid om te knippen, kopiëren en plakken moeiteloos met de rechtermuisknop met de rechtermuisknop en de lintwerkbalk tijdens het werken met kantoor op internet werken. Zeg afscheid van het frustreren van beperkingen en hallo aan naadloze productiviteit. 
 
 "Schakel met de rechtermuisknop in - beperk kopiëren/selecteer" werkt onafhankelijk voor elk tabblad, waardoor u volledige controle hebt over uw kopieerervaring. Klik eenvoudig op het extensiepictogram om het in of uit te schakelen. Je vindt de status van de extensie die gemakkelijk op de werkbalk in de rechterbovenhoek wordt weergegeven - een groene teek aangeeft ingeschakeld, terwijl een grijze teek wordt uitgeschakeld. 
 
 Maar hoe werkt deze extensie zijn magie? Welnu, vanwege bepaalde beperkingen die inherent zijn aan webbrowsers, zijn extra machtigingen vereist voor het kopiëren en plakken in Microsoft Office voor internet via menu's.  Om volledig te genieten van de voordelen van deze extensie, zorg er dan voor dat u de webpagina na installatie opnieuw laadt. Als u wijzigingen aanbrengt in de instellingen, onthoud dan dat alle open tabbladen moeten worden herladen om van kracht te worden.  Deze ongelooflijke extensie biedt de extra machtigingen die nodig zijn om kopiëren en plakken in Microsoft Office voor internet mogelijk te maken. Zeg vaarwel tegen frustrerende beperkingen en hallo aan naadloze productiviteit.

En maak je geen zorgen, schakel met de rechtermuisknop in - beperk kopiëren/selecteer respect voor uw privacy door uw browsegeschiedenis op geen enkele manier te volgen of te gebruiken. Het vereist alleen toegang tot de actieve toestanden van uw tabbladen. 
 
 Om een soepele werking te garanderen, vergeet niet om uw webpagina opnieuw te laden na het installeren van deze game-veranderende extensie. Als u wijzigingen in de instellingen aanbrengt, moet u alle open tabbladen opnieuw laden zodat ze van kracht worden. long.no:
Aktiver kontekstmeny og velg, tillat valg, tillat kopiering, tillat høyreklikk på så restriktive sider.

Når du installerer denne gratis utvidelsen, kan du klippe, kopiere og lime via høyreklikksmenyer og ribbontoolbaren når du bruker Office på nettet.

På grunn av begrensninger i nettlesere, krever kopiering og liming i Microsoft Office for web gjennom menyer ytterligere tillatelser som gis gjennom denne utvidelsen.

Aktiver kopiering og høyreklikk på beskyttede nettsider.

Bruk:
- Klikk browser action icon for å gå inn i "copy mode" for gjeldende side
Funksjoner:
- Låser opp kopiering (for ekte)
- Husker hvilken side som skal låses opp for fremtidige besøk

---> Når denne utvidelsen er installert, må du laste inn alle åpne faner for at den skal fungere <---

---> Hvis du endrer utvidelsesinnstillingene, må alle åpne faner lastes inn for at de skal tre i kraft <----

SØRG FOR Å OMLASTE NETTSIDEN ETTER INSTALLASJON AV DENNE UTVIDELSEN. 

- Siden utvidelsen må vite de aktive fanene, er den grunnleggende tillatelsen den trenger "faner". Men Chrome vil merke det som "kan lese og endre all data på nettsteder du besøker" mens du ber om tillatelse. Denne utvidelsen sporer eller bruker ikke surfingen din på noen måte. Den eneste informasjonen den trenger er de aktive tilstandene til fanene. 

Copy & Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" er en løsning for nettsteder som blokkerer Copy, Paste, Select Text og Right clicks. 

- Denne utvidelsen fungerer separat for hver fane. 
- Klikk på utvidelsesikonet for å aktivere / deaktivere det. 
- Utvidelsen deaktiveres ved sideoppdatering. 
- Sjekk statusen aktivert (grønn prikk) eller deaktivert (grå prikk) av utvidelsen på verktøylinjen (øverst til høyre).
 Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens Copy/SELECT er et program som lar brukere kutte, kopiere og lime inn via høyreklikk -menyer og verktøylinjer for bånd når du bruker Office på nettet. Installere denne gratis utvidelsen lar deg aktivere kopi, tillate kopi, høyreklikk, enkel kopi, aktivere høyreklikk, begrense kopi, kontekstmeny og gi mulighet for kopiering og lim inn Microsoft Office for nettet gjennom menyer. Denne utvidelsen fungerer uavhengig for hver fane; Å klikke på utvidelsesikonet vil aktivere/deaktivere det. Utvidelsen blir deaktivert på siden på nytt; Kontroller status som er aktivert (grønn flått) eller deaktivert (grå flått) av utvidelsen på verktøylinjen (øverst til høyre hjørne). 
 
 På grunn av begrensninger i nettlesere, kopierer og lim inn på Microsoft Office for nettet gjennom menyer, krever ytterligere tillatelser som gis gjennom denne utvidelsen. Den låser opp kopi (for ekte) og husker hvilke nettsteder for å fjerne blokkering for fremtidige besøk. Denne utvidelsen sporer ikke eller bruker nettleserhistorikken din på noen måter; Den eneste informasjonen den trenger er de aktive tilstandene i fanene. 
 
 Sørg for å laste inn nettsiden på nytt etter å ha installert denne utvidelsen; Hvis du endrer innstillingene, må eventuelle åpne faner lastes på nytt for at de skal tre i kraft. Siden utvidelsen trenger å kjenne de aktive fanene, så er den grunnleggende tillatelsen den krever "faner". Imidlertid vil Chrome merke det som "kan lese og endre alle dataene dine på nettsteder du besøker" mens du ber om tillatelse. Vi introduserer den må -ha -utvidelsen: "Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens kopi/velg" 
 
 Er du lei av begrensningene som er pålagt av nettlesere når det gjelder kopiering og liming på Microsoft Office for nettet? Se ikke lenger! Med gratis utvidelse, "Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens kopi/velg," Du kan nå slippe løs det fulle potensialet til kopien og limfunksjonene. 
 
 Denne kraftige utvidelsen gir deg muligheten til å kutte, kopiere og lime inn Uanstrengt å bruke høyreklikk-menyer og verktøylinjen for båndet mens du jobber med Office på nettet. Si farvel til frustrerende begrensninger og hei til sømløs produktivitet. 
 
 "Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens kopi/velg" fungerer uavhengig for hver fane, noe som gir deg full kontroll over kopieringsopplevelsen. Bare klikk på utvidelsesikonet for å aktivere eller deaktivere det. Du finner statusen til utvidelsen enkelt vist på verktøylinjen i øverste høyre hjørne - en grønn flått indikerer aktivert, mens en grå flått betegner deaktivert. 
 
 Men hvordan fungerer denne utvidelsen sin magi? På grunn av visse begrensninger som ligger i nettlesere, er det nødvendig med ytterligere tillatelser for å kopiere og lime inn Microsoft Office for nettet gjennom menyer. Det er her "Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens Copy/Select" kommer godt med. Den låser opp den sanne kraften til kopien (for ekte) og husker til og med hvilke nettsteder for å fjerne blokkering for fremtidige besøk. Forsikre deg om at denne utvidelsen respekterer personvernet ditt ved ikke å spore eller bruke nettleserhistorikken din på noen måte. Alt det trenger er kunnskap om dine aktive faner. 
 
 For å glede deg over fordelene med denne utvidelsen, må du huske å laste inn nettsiden etter installasjonen. Hvis du gjør endringer i innstillingene, må du huske at alle åpne faner må lastes på nytt for at de skal tre i kraft. Chrome kan be om tillatelse som er merket som "kan lese og endre alle dataene dine på nettsteder du besøker," men frykter ikke - det er ganske enkelt fordi utvidelsen trenger tilgang for å vite hvilke faner som er aktive. 
 
 Opplev et helt nytt nivå på Bekvemmelighet og effektivitet med "Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens kopi/velg." Ikke la nettleserbegrensninger holde deg tilbake - mulighet til å kopiere, lime inn og erobre med letthet. Innføring av den ultimate kopien og limingsløsningen: Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens Copy/Select 
 
 Er du lei av å være begrenset fra å kopiere og lime inn på Microsoft Office for nettet? Se ikke lenger! Med gratis utvidelse, "Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens Copy/Select", kan du nå låse opp kraften til å kutte, kopiere og lime inn gjennom høyreklikk -menyer og båndverktøylinjen. 
 
 Denne utrolige utvidelsen gir de ekstra tillatelsene som er nødvendige for å muliggjøre kopiering og liming på Microsoft Office for nettet. Ta farvel med frustrerende begrensninger og hei til sømløs produktivitet. 
 
 En av de fremtredende funksjonene for Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens Copy/Select er dens evne til å jobbe uavhengig for hver fane. Bare klikk på utvidelsesikonet for å aktivere eller deaktivere det. I tillegg trenger du aldri å bekymre deg for å miste innstillingene dine, da utvidelsen automatisk deaktiverer seg selv på Page Reload. Hold øye med statusen til utvidelsen med et raskt blikk på verktøylinjen øverst til høyre. 
 
 Vi forstår at nettlesere har sine begrensninger når det gjelder kopiering og liming på Microsoft Office for nettet. Derfor er denne utvidelsen her for å redde dagen. Den låser opp kopieringsfunksjonalitet slik at du virkelig kan slippe løs produktivitetspotensialet. Og ikke bekymre deg, aktivere høyreklikk - Begrens kopi/velg respekterer personvernet ditt ved ikke å spore eller bruke nettleserhistorikken din på noen måte. Det krever bare tilgang til de aktive tilstandene til fanene dine. 
 
 For å sikre jevn drift, husk å laste inn nettsiden din på nytt etter å ha installert denne spillendringsutvidelsen. Hvis du gjør endringer i innstillingene, må du huske å laste inn alle åpne faner for at de skal tre i kraft. Chrome kan be om tillatelse som er merket som "kan lese og endre alle dataene dine på nettsteder du besøker", men vær trygg på at det ganske enkelt er nødvendig å vite hvilke faner som er aktive. 
 
 Si farvel til kopieringsbegrensninger og hei til en helhet Nytt produktivitetsnivå med Aktiver høyreklikk - Begrens kopi/velg. Ikke gå glipp av denne must-ha-utvidelsen som vil revolusjonere måten du jobber på Microsoft Office for nettet. Gjør deg klar til å slippe løs kraften til å kopiere og lime inn som aldri før. Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

Instalacja tego darmowego rozszerzenia umożliwia wycinanie, kopiowanie i wklejanie za pomocą menu kontekstowego i paska narzędzi paska narzędzi podczas korzystania z Office w sieci.

Ze względu na ograniczenia przeglądarek internetowych, kopiowanie i wklejanie w Microsoft Office dla sieci przez menu wymaga dodatkowych uprawnień, które są dostarczane przez to rozszerzenie.

Włącz menu kontekstowe i zaznaczanie, pozwól na zaznaczanie, pozwól na kopiowanie, pozwól na kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy na tak ograniczone strony.

Użycie:
- Kliknij ikonę działania przeglądarki, aby wejść w tryb "kopiowania" dla bieżącej witryny
Funkcje:
- Odblokowuje kopiowanie (na serio)
- Zapamiętuje, którą witrynę należy odblokować na przyszłe wizyty

---> Po zainstalowaniu tego rozszerzenia musisz ponownie załadować wszystkie otwarte karty, aby to działało <---

---> Jeśli zmienisz ustawienia rozszerzenia, wszystkie otwarte karty muszą być ponownie załadowane, aby zostały one uwzględnione <----

UPEWNIJ SIĘ, ŻE PONOWNIE ZAŁADUJESZ STRONĘ PO ZAINSTALOWANIU TEGO ROZSZERZENIA.

- Ponieważ rozszerzenie musi znać aktywne karty, podstawowe uprawnienie, którego wymaga, to „karty”. Ale Chrome oznaczy je jako „możesz czytać i zmieniać wszystkie swoje dane na odwiedzanych stronach” podczas proszenia o uprawnienia. To rozszerzenie nie śledzi ani nie używa historii przeglądania w żaden sposób. Jedyne informacje, jakich potrzebuje, to aktywne stany kart. 

Rozszerzenie Copy & Paste Pro "Enable Right Click" to rozwiązanie dla witryn internetowych, które blokują Kopiuj, Wklej, Wybierz tekst i Kliknięcia prawym przyciskiem myszy.

- To rozszerzenie działa oddzielnie dla każdej karty.
- Kliknięcie ikony rozszerzenia włącza / wyłącza je.
- Rozszerzenie jest wyłączane po ponownym załadowaniu strony.
- Sprawdź status włączony (zielona gwiazdka) lub wyłączony (szarawa gwiazdka) rozszerzenia na pasku narzędzi (w prawym górnym rogu).
 Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/Wybierz to aplikacja, która umożliwia użytkownikom wycinanie, kopiowanie i wklejanie za pomocą menu prawym przyciskiem myszy i pasków narzędzi wstążkowych podczas korzystania z Office w Internecie. Instalowanie tego bezpłatnego rozszerzenia umożliwia włączenie kopiowania, zezwalania na kopiowanie, kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy, proste kopię, włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy, ogranicz kopię, menu kontekstowe i umożliwić kopiowanie i wklejanie w Microsoft Office dla sieci za pośrednictwem menu. To rozszerzenie działa niezależnie dla każdej zakładki; Kliknięcie ikony rozszerzenia włączy/wyłączy. Rozszerzenie jest wyłączone na przeładowaniu strony; Sprawdź status włączony (zielony kleszcz) lub wyłączony (szary kleszcz) rozszerzenia na pasku narzędzi (prawy górny róg). 
 
 Ze względu na ograniczenia przeglądarek internetowych, kopiowanie i wklejanie w Microsoft Office dla Internetu za pośrednictwem menu wymaga dodatkowych uprawnień, które są dostarczane przez to rozszerzenie. Odblokowuje kopię (naprawdę) i pamięta, które strony odblokować na przyszłe wizyty. To rozszerzenie nie śledzi ani nie używa historii przeglądania w żaden sposób; Jedynymi potrzebnymi informacjami są aktywne stany kart. 
 
 Pamiętaj, aby ponownie załadować stronę internetową po zainstalowaniu tego rozszerzenia; Jeśli zmienisz ustawienia, należy ponownie załadować otwarte zakładki, aby mogły one uwzględnić. Ponieważ rozszerzenie musi znać aktywne zakładki, podstawową zgodą wymaganą jest „zakładki”. Jednak Chrome określi go jako „może odczytać i zmienić wszystkie dane na witrynach, które odwiedzasz”, jednocześnie prosząc o pozwolenie. Wprowadzenie rozszerzenia obowiązkowego: „Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/wybierz” 
 
 Czy jesteś zmęczony ograniczeniami nałożonymi przez przeglądarki internetowe, jeśli chodzi o kopiowanie i wklejanie w Microsoft Office dla sieci? Nie szukaj dalej! Dzięki bezpłatnemu rozszerzeniu „Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/wybierz”, możesz teraz uwolnić pełny potencjał funkcji kopii i wklejania. 
 
 To potężne rozszerzenie zapewnia możliwość wycinania, kopiowania i wklejania Bez wysiłku przy kliknięciu menu prawym przyciskiem myszy i paska narzędzi wstążki podczas pracy z biurem w Internecie. Pożegnaj się z frustrującymi ograniczeniami i witam płynną wydajność. 
 
 „Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/wybór” działa niezależnie dla każdej karty, zapewniając pełną kontrolę nad kopiowaniem. Po prostu kliknij ikonę rozszerzenia, aby ją włączyć lub wyłączyć. Znajdziesz status rozszerzenia wyświetlanego na pasku narzędzi w prawym górnym rogu - zielony kleszcz oznacza włączony, podczas gdy szary topnik oznacza wyłączony. 
 
 Ale w jaki sposób to rozszerzenie działa w jego magii? Cóż, ze względu na pewne ograniczenia związane z przeglądarkami internetowymi, wymagane są dodatkowe uprawnienia do kopiowania i wklejania w Microsoft Office dla sieci za pośrednictwem menu. Tutaj przydaje się „Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - ogranicz kopię/wybór”. Odblokowuje prawdziwą moc kopii (naprawdę), a nawet pamięta, które strony odblokować na przyszłe wizyty. Zapewniamy, że to rozszerzenie szanuje twoją prywatność, nie śledząc ani nie wykorzystując historii przeglądania. Wszystko, czego potrzebuje, to znajomość twoich aktywnych kart. 
 
 Aby w pełni cieszyć się korzyściami z tego rozszerzenia, pamiętaj, aby ponownie załadować stronę internetową po instalacji. Jeśli wprowadzisz jakiekolwiek zmiany w ustawieniach, pamiętaj, że wszystkie otwarte zakładki muszą zostać ponownie załadowane, aby mogły one uwzględnić. Chrome może poprosić o uprawnienie oznaczone jako „może odczytać i zmienić wszystkie dane na odwiedzanych stronach internetowych”, ale nie obawiaj się - to po prostu dlatego, że rozszerzenie wymaga dostępu, aby wiedzieć, które zakładki są aktywne. 
 
 Doświadcz zupełnie nowego poziomu Wygoda i wydajność za pomocą „Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - ogranicz kopię/wybierz”. Nie pozwól, aby ograniczenia przeglądarki cię powstrzymywały - upoważnij się do kopiowania, wklejania i pokonania z łatwością. Wprowadzenie ostatecznego rozwiązania kopii i wklejania: Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/Wybierz 
 
 Czy jesteś zmęczony ograniczaniem się do kopiowania i wklejania w Microsoft Office dla Internetu? Nie szukaj dalej! Dzięki bezpłatnemu rozszerzeniu „Włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/Wybierz”, możesz teraz odblokować moc cięcia, kopiowania i wkleić za pomocą menu przycisku prawym przyciskiem myszy i paska narzędzi wstążki. 
 
 To niesamowite rozszerzenie zapewnia dodatkowe uprawnienia niezbędne do umożliwienia kopiowania i wklejania w Microsoft Office dla Internetu. Pożegnaj się z frustrującymi ograniczeniami i witam płynną wydajność. 
 
 Jedną z wyróżniających się funkcji Enable Kliknij prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/wybór jest jego zdolnością do niezależnej pracy dla każdej karty. Po prostu kliknij ikonę rozszerzenia, aby ją włączyć lub wyłączyć. Ponadto nigdy nie będziesz musiał martwić się utratą ustawień, ponieważ rozszerzenie automatycznie wyłącza się po przeładowaniu strony. Miej oko na status rozszerzenia z szybkim spojrzeniem na pasek narzędzi w prawym górnym rogu. 
 
 Rozumiemy, że przeglądarki internetowe mają swoje ograniczenia, jeśli chodzi o kopiowanie i wklejanie w Microsoft Office dla sieci. Dlatego to rozszerzenie jest tutaj, aby uratować dzień. Odblokowuje funkcjonalność kopii, dzięki czemu możesz naprawdę uwolnić swój potencjał wydajności. I nie martw się, włącz kliknięcie prawym przyciskiem myszy - Ogranicz kopię/Wybierz Szanuje swoją prywatność, nie śledząc lub używając historii przeglądania. Wymaga to tylko dostępu do aktywnych stanów kart. Jeśli wprowadzisz jakiekolwiek zmiany w ustawieniach, pamiętaj, aby ponownie załadować wszystkie otwarte zakładki, aby mogły one uwzględnić. Chrome może poprosić o uprawnienie oznaczone jako „może odczytać i zmienić wszystkie dane na witrynach, które odwiedzasz”, ale zapewniamy, że po prostu trzeba wiedzieć, które karty są aktywne.

Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:
- Click browser action icon to enter "copy mode" for current site
Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

---> Once this extension is installed you must reload any open tabs in order for it to work<---

--->If you change the extension settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect <----

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- Since the extension needs to know the active tabs , so the basic permission it requires is "tabs" . But Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit " while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" is a solution for websites that block Copy , Paste , Select Text and Right clicks .

- This extension works separately for each tab .
- Clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it .
- The extension gets disabled on page reload .
- Check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner).
Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity.

long.pt_BR:
Instale esta extensão gratuita para permitir cortar, copiar e colar usando menus de clique direito e a barra de ferramentas da faixa quando usar o Office na web. Devido às limitações dos navegadores da web, copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a web através de menus exige permissões adicionais que são fornecidas por meio desta extensão. Habilitar cópia e clique direito em sites protegidos.

Uso:
- Clique no ícone da ação do navegador para entrar no "modo de cópia" para o site atual
Recursos:
- Desbloqueia cópia (de verdade)
- Lembra qual site desbloquear para futuras visitas

---> Uma vez que esta extensão esteja instalada, você deve recarregar quaisquer guias abertas para que ela funcione <---

---> Se você alterar as configurações da extensão, quaisquer guias abertas devem ser recarregadas para que elas tenham efeito <----

TENHA CERTEZA DE RECARREGAR A PÁGINA DA WEB APÓS INSTALAR ESTA EXTENSÃO.

- Como a extensão precisa saber as guias ativas, a permissão básica que ela requer é "guias". Mas o Chrome rotulará como "pode ler e alterar todos os seus dados em sites que você visita" enquanto solicita a permissão. Esta extensão não rastreia ou usa seu histórico de navegação de nenhuma maneira. A única informação que ela precisa é o estado ativo das guias. 

A extensão Copy&Paste Pro "Enable Right Click" é uma solução para sites que bloqueiam Copiar, Colar, Selecionar Texto e Cliques Direitos. 
- Esta extensão funciona separadamente para cada guia. 
- Clique no ícone da extensão para habilitá-la/desabilitá-la. 
- A extensão é desativada na recarga da página. 
- Verifique o status habilitado (visto verde) ou desabilitado (visto cinza) da extensão na barra de ferramentas (canto superior direito).
 Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - O RESTRITE COPY/SELECT é um aplicativo que permite aos usuários cortar, copiar e colar por meio do botão direito do clique com o botão direito do mouse e barras de ferramentas de fita ao usar o Office na Web. A instalação desta extensão gratuita permite ativar a cópia, permitir cópia, clicar com o botão direito do mouse, cópia simples, ativar o botão direito do mouse, restringir o menu de cópia, e permitir copiar e colar no Microsoft Office for the Web por meio de menus. Esta extensão funciona de forma independente para cada guia; Clicar no ícone de extensão o habilitará/desativará. A extensão é desativada na página recarrega; Verifique o status ativado (carrapato verde) ou desativado (carrapato cinza) da extensão na barra de ferramentas (canto superior direito). 
 
 Devido a limitações de navegadores da Web, copiar e colar no Microsoft Office for the Web através de menus requer permissões adicionais fornecidas através dessa extensão. Ele desbloqueia cópia (para real) e lembra quais sites desbloquearem para futuras visitas. Esta extensão não rastreia ou usa seu histórico de navegação de qualquer maneira; A única informação necessária são os estados ativos das guias. 
 
 Certifique -se de recarregar a página da web após a instalação desta extensão; Se você alterar as configurações, qualquer guia aberta deverá ser recarregada para que eles entrem em vigor. Como a extensão precisa conhecer as guias ativas, a permissão básica necessária é "guias". No entanto, o Chrome o rotulará como "pode ler e alterar todos os seus dados em sites que você visitar" enquanto solicita a permissão. Apresentando a extensão obrigatória: "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - restrinja a cópia/selecione" 
 
 Você está cansado das limitações impostas pelos navegadores da Web quando se trata de copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web? Não procure mais! Com a extensão livre, "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - restrinja a cópia/selecione" agora você pode liberar todo o potencial de suas funções de cópia e colar. Usando sem esforço os menus clique com o botão direito do mouse e na barra de ferramentas da faixa de opções enquanto trabalhava com o Office na Web. Diga adeus às restrições frustrantes e olá à produtividade perfeita. Basta clicar no ícone de extensão para ativá -lo ou desativá -lo. Você encontrará o status da extensão convenientemente exibida na barra de ferramentas no canto superior direito - um carrapato verde indica ativado, enquanto um carrapato cinza indica desativado. 
 
 Mas como essa extensão funciona sua mágica? Bem, devido a certas limitações inerentes aos navegadores da Web, são necessárias permissões adicionais para copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web através de menus. É aqui que "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre a copiar/selecionar" é útil. Ele desbloqueia o verdadeiro poder da cópia (para real) e até lembra quais sites desbloquearem para futuras visitas. Tenha certeza, esta extensão respeita sua privacidade, não rastreando ou utilizando seu histórico de navegação de forma alguma. Tudo o que precisa é do conhecimento de suas guias ativas. Se você fizer alterações nas configurações, lembre -se de que todas as guias abertas devem ser recarregadas para que elas entrem em vigor. O Chrome pode solicitar permissão rotulada como "pode ler e alterar todos os seus dados em sites que você visita", mas não tema - é simplesmente porque a extensão precisa de acesso para saber quais guias estão ativas. 
 
 Experimente um nível totalmente novo de Conveniência e eficiência com "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - restrinja a cópia/selecione". Não deixe que as restrições do navegador o impedem - capacite -se a copiar, colar e conquistar com facilidade. Apresentando a solução final de cópia e colar: Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre a copiar/selecionar 
 
 Você está cansado de se restringir de copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web? Não procure mais! Com a extensão gratuita, "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre copiar/selecionar", agora você pode desbloquear a potência do corte, copiar e colar através dos menus do clique com o botão direito do mouse e da barra de ferramentas da faixa de opções. 
 
 Esta extensão incrível fornece as permissões adicionais necessárias para permitir a cópia e a colagem no Microsoft Office para a Web. Diga adeus a limitações frustrantes e olá à produtividade perfeita. 
 
 Um dos recursos de destaque do clique com o botão direito do mouse - restringir a cópia/selecionar é sua capacidade de trabalhar de forma independente para cada guia. Basta clicar no ícone de extensão para ativá -lo ou desativá -lo. Além disso, você nunca precisará se preocupar em perder suas configurações, pois a extensão se desativa automaticamente após a recarga da página. Fique de olho no status da extensão com um rápido olhar na barra de ferramentas no canto superior direito. 
 
 Entendemos que os navegadores da Web têm suas limitações quando se trata de copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web. É por isso que essa extensão está aqui para salvar o dia. Ele desbloqueia a funcionalidade de cópia para que você possa realmente liberar seu potencial de produtividade. E não se preocupe, habilite o clique com o botão direito do mouse - restrinja a cópia/selecione sua privacidade, não rastreando ou usando seu histórico de navegação de alguma forma. Requer apenas acesso aos estados ativos de suas guias. Se você fizer alguma alteração nas configurações, não se esqueça de recarregar todas as guias abertas para que eles entrem em vigor. O Chrome pode solicitar permissão rotulada como "pode ler e alterar todos os seus dados em sites que você visitar", mas tenha certeza de que é simplesmente necessário saber quais guias estão ativas. 
 
 Diga adeus para copiar restrições e olá para um todo Novo nível de produtividade com o clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre a copiar/selecionar. Não perca esta extensão obrigatória que revolucionará a maneira como você trabalha no Microsoft Office para a Web. Prepare -se para liberar o poder de copiar e colar como nunca antes. Bem, devido a certas limitações inerentes aos navegadores da Web, são necessárias permissões adicionais para copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web através de menus. É aqui que "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre a copiar/selecionar" é útil. Ele desbloqueia o verdadeiro poder da cópia (para real) e até lembra quais sites desbloquearem para futuras visitas. Tenha certeza, esta extensão respeita sua privacidade, não rastreando ou utilizando seu histórico de navegação de forma alguma. Tudo o que precisa é do conhecimento de suas guias ativas. Se você fizer alterações nas configurações, lembre -se de que todas as guias abertas devem ser recarregadas para que elas entrem em vigor. O Chrome pode solicitar permissão rotulada como "pode ler e alterar todos os seus dados em sites que você visita", mas não tema - é simplesmente porque a extensão precisa de acesso para saber quais guias estão ativas. 
 
 Experimente um nível totalmente novo de Conveniência e eficiência com "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - restrinja a cópia/selecione". Não deixe que as restrições do navegador o impedem - capacite -se a copiar, colar e conquistar com facilidade. Apresentando a solução final de cópia e colar: Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre a copiar/selecionar 
 
 Você está cansado de se restringir de copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web? Não procure mais! Com a extensão gratuita, "Ativar clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre copiar/selecionar", agora você pode desbloquear a potência do corte, copiar e colar através dos menus do clique com o botão direito do mouse e da barra de ferramentas da faixa de opções. 
 
 Esta extensão incrível fornece as permissões adicionais necessárias para permitir a cópia e a colagem no Microsoft Office para a Web. Diga adeus a limitações frustrantes e olá à produtividade perfeita. 
 
 Um dos recursos de destaque do clique com o botão direito do mouse - restringir a cópia/selecionar é sua capacidade de trabalhar de forma independente para cada guia. Basta clicar no ícone de extensão para ativá -lo ou desativá -lo. Além disso, você nunca precisará se preocupar em perder suas configurações, pois a extensão se desativa automaticamente após a recarga da página. Fique de olho no status da extensão com um rápido olhar na barra de ferramentas no canto superior direito. 
 
 Entendemos que os navegadores da Web têm suas limitações quando se trata de copiar e colar no Microsoft Office para a Web. É por isso que essa extensão está aqui para salvar o dia. Ele desbloqueia a funcionalidade de cópia para que você possa realmente liberar seu potencial de produtividade. E não se preocupe, habilite o clique com o botão direito do mouse - restrinja a cópia/selecione sua privacidade, não rastreando ou usando seu histórico de navegação de alguma forma. Requer apenas acesso aos estados ativos de suas guias. Se você fizer alguma alteração nas configurações, não se esqueça de recarregar todas as guias abertas para que eles entrem em vigor. O Chrome pode solicitar permissão rotulada como "pode ler e alterar todos os seus dados em sites que você visitar", mas tenha certeza de que é simplesmente necessário saber quais guias estão ativas. 
 
 Diga adeus para copiar restrições e olá para um todo Novo nível de produtividade com o clique com o botão direito do mouse - Restre a copiar/selecionar. Não perca esta extensão obrigatória que revolucionará a maneira como você trabalha no Microsoft Office para a Web. Prepare -se para liberar o poder de copiar e colar como nunca antes. Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:
- Click browser action icon to enter "copy mode" for current site
Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

---> Once this extension is installed you must reload any open tabs in order for it to work<---

--->If you change the extension settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect <----

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- Since the extension needs to know the active tabs , so the basic permission it requires is "tabs" . But Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit " while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" is a solution for websites that block Copy , Paste , Select Text and Right clicks .

- This extension works separately for each tab .
- Clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it .
- The extension gets disabled on page reload .
- Check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner).
Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

Instaliranje te brezplačne razširitve vam omogoča, da izrežete, kopirate in prilepite prek menijev z desnim gumbom miške in orodne vrstice, ko uporabljate Office na spletu. Zaradi omejitev spletnih brskalnikov zahteva kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet prek menijev dodatne dovoljenja, ki so na voljo prek te razširitve. Omogočite kopiranje in desni klik na zaščitenih spletnih straneh. Uporaba: - Kliknite ikono dejanja brskalnika za vstop v "način kopiranja" za trenutno stran. Značilnosti: - Odklene kopiranje (za resnično) - Spomni si, katero stran je treba odblokirati za bodoče obiske. ---> Po namestitvi te razširitve morate ponovno naložiti vsa odprta zavihka, da bi delovala <--- ---> Če spremenite nastavitve razširitve, morajo biti vsi odprti zavihki ponovno naloženi, da bodo učinkovali <---- ZAGOTOVITE PONOVNO NALOŽITE SPLETNO STRAN PO NAMESTITVI TE RAZŠIRITVE. - Ker razširitev potrebuje podatke o aktivnih zavihkih, potrebno osnovno dovoljenje je "zavihki". Vendar bo Chrome to označil kot "lahko preberete in spremenite vse svoje podatke na obiskanih spletnih straneh", medtem ko bo zahteval dovoljenje. Ta razširitev ne sledi ali uporablja vaše zgodovine brskanja na noben način. Edini podatki, ki jih potrebuje, so aktivni stanji zavihkov. Copy & Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" je rešitev za spletne strani, ki blokirajo kopiranje, lepljenje, izbiro besedila in desni klik. - Ta razširitev deluje posebej za vsak zavihek. - Kliknite na ikono razširitve, da jo omogočite / onemogočite. - Razširitev se onemogoči ob ponovnem nalaganju strani. - Preverite stanje omogočeno (zelena kljukica) ali onemogočeno (siva kljukica) razširitve na orodni vrstici (v desnem zgornjem kotu).
 Omogoči z desnim klikom - Restrict Copy/Select je aplikacija, ki uporabnikom omogoča rezanje, kopiranje in lepljenje z desnim miškim tipkam in orodne vrstice pri uporabi Office na spletu. Namestitev te brezplačne razširitve vam omogoča, da omogočite kopijo, dovolite kopiranje, desno miškino tipko, preprosto kopijo, omogočite z desno miškino tipko, omejite kopijo, kontekstni meni in dovolite kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet prek menijev. Ta razširitev deluje neodvisno za vsak zavihek; Če kliknete ikono razširitve, jo omogočite/onemogočite. Razširitev je onemogočena na strani Ponovno naloži; Preverite omogočeno stanje (Green Tick) ali onemogočeno (Grey Tick) razširitve v orodni vrstici (zgornji desni kot). 
 
 Zaradi omejitev spletnih brskalnikov kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet prek menijev zahteva dodatna dovoljenja, ki so zagotovljena s to razširitvijo. Odklene kopijo (zares) in se spomni, katera spletna mesta odblokirajo za prihodnje obiske. Ta razširitev na kakršen koli način ne sledi ali ne uporablja zgodovine brskanja; Edina informacija, ki jo potrebuje, so aktivna stanja zavihka. 
 
 Po namestitvi te razširitve se prepričajte, da ponovno naložite spletno stran; Če spremenite nastavitve, je treba vse odprte zavihke ponovno naložiti, da lahko začnejo veljati. Ker mora razširitev poznati aktivne zavihke, je osnovno dovoljenje, ki ga potrebuje, "zavihki". Vendar pa ga bo Chrome označil za "lahko branje in spremenite vse svoje podatke na spletnih mestih, ki jih obiščete", medtem ko zaprosi za dovoljenje. Predstavitev obvezne razširitve: "Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izbiro" 
 
 Ali ste utrujeni od omejitev, ki jih nalagajo spletni brskalniki, ko gre za kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet? Ne iščite več! Z brezplačno razširitvijo, "Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izbiro", lahko zdaj sprostite celoten potencial funkcij za kopiranje in prilepi brez napora z desno miškino tipko in orodno vrstico traku med sodelovanjem z Office na spletu. Poslovite se od frustrirajočih omejitev in pozdravite brezhibno produktivnost. 
 
 "Omogoči z desno miškino tipko - omejite kopiranje/izbiro" neodvisno deluje za vsak zavihek, kar vam omogoča popoln nadzor nad svojo izkušnjo s kopiranjem. Preprosto kliknite ikono razširitve, da jo omogočite ali onemogočite. Status razširitve boste našli priročno na orodni vrstici v zgornjem desnem kotu - zelena klopa označuje omogočena, siva klopa pa označuje onemogočeno. 
 
 Toda kako ta razširitev deluje njena čarovnija? No, zaradi nekaterih omejitev, ki so povezane s spletnimi brskalniki, so potrebna dodatna dovoljenja za kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet prek menijev. Tu je koristno "Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izberite". Odklene resnično moč kopije (zares) in se celo spomni, katera spletna mesta odblokirajo za prihodnje obiske. Bodite prepričani, ta razširitev spoštuje vašo zasebnost, tako da na kakršen koli način ne spremljate ali uporabite zgodovine brskanja. Vse, kar potrebuje, je znanje o vaših aktivnih zavihkih. Če spremenite nastavitve, ne pozabite, da morajo biti vsi odprti zavihki ponovno naloženi, da začnejo veljati. Chrome lahko zahteva dovoljenje, označeno kot "lahko prebere in spremeni vse svoje podatke na spletnih mestih, ki jih obiščete" udobje in učinkovitost z "Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izbiro." Ne dovolite, da vas omejitve brskalnika zadržujejo - opolnomočite se, da boste z lahkoto kopirali, prilepili in osvojili. Predstavitev rešitve za končni kopiranje in lepljenje: Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji Copy/Select 
 
 Ali ste utrujeni, da ste omejeni od kopiranja in lepljenja v Microsoft Office za splet? Ne iščite več! Z brezplačno razširitvijo, "Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izbiro", zdaj lahko odklenete moč reza, kopiranje in prilepite z desno miškino tipko in orodno vrstico s trakom. 
 
 Ta neverjetna razširitev ponuja dodatna dovoljenja, potrebna za kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet. Poslovite se od frustrirajočih omejitev in pozdravite brezhibno produktivnost. 
 
 Ena od izstopajočih funkcij Enable z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izbiro je njegova sposobnost samostojnega dela za vsak zavihek. Preprosto kliknite ikono razširitve, da jo omogočite ali onemogočite. Poleg tega vam nikoli ne bo treba skrbeti, da boste izgubili nastavitve, saj se razširitev samodejno onemogoči ob ponovnem nalaganju strani. Bodite pozorni na stanje razširitve s hitrim pogledom na orodno vrstico v zgornjem desnem kotu. 
 
 Razumemo, da imajo spletni brskalniki svoje omejitve, ko gre za kopiranje in lepljenje v Microsoft Office za splet. Zato je ta razširitev tu, da prihrani dan. Odklene funkcionalnost kopije, tako da lahko resnično sprostite svoj potencial produktivnosti. In ne skrbite, omogočite z desnim klikom - omejite kopiranje/izberite, spoštuje svojo zasebnost, tako da na kakršen koli način ne sledite ali uporabljate zgodovine brskanja. Potreben je le dostop do aktivnih stanj vaših zavihkov. 
 
 Če želite zagotoviti nemoteno delovanje, ne pozabite znova naložiti svoje spletne strani po namestitvi te razširitve, ki spreminja igro. Če spremenite nastavitve, ne pozabite ponovno naložiti vseh zavihkov odprtih zavihki, da začnejo uvesti. Chrome lahko zahteva dovoljenje, ki je označeno kot "lahko prebere in spremeni vse svoje podatke na spletnih mestih, ki jih obiščete", vendar bodite prepričani, da je preprosto potrebno vedeti, kateri zavihki so aktivni. Nova raven produktivnosti z Omogoči z desnim klikom - omeji kopiranje/izbiro. Ne zamudite tega obveznega razširitve, ki bo spremenila način dela v Microsoft Office za splet. Pripravite se, da sprostite moč kopije in lepljenja kot še nikoli doslej. Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner).

It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs.

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect.
