Installera denna gratis tillägg för att kunna klippa, kopiera och klistra via högerklickmenyer och ribbontoolbar när du använder Office på webben.

På grund av begränsningar i webbläsare krävs ytterligare behörigheter för att kopiera och klistra in i Microsoft Office för webben genom menyer, vilka tillhandahålls av denna utökning.

Aktivera kopiering och högerklickning på skyddade webbplatser.

Användning:
- Klicka på ikonen för webbläsaråtgärd för att gå in i "kopieringsläge" för aktuell sida
Funktioner:
- Låser upp kopiering (på riktigt)
- Kommer ihåg vilken sida som ska låsas upp för framtida besök

---> När denna utökning är installerad måste du ladda om alla öppna flikar för att den ska fungera <---

---> Om du ändrar inställningarna för utökningen måste alla öppna flikar laddas om för att de ska träda i kraft <----

SE TILL ATT LADDAR OM WEBBPLATSEN EFTER ATT DU INSTALLERAT DENNA UTÖKNING.

- Eftersom utökningen måste veta de aktiva flikarna, så är den grundläggande behörigheten som den kräver "flikar". Men Chrome kommer att märka det som "kan läsa och ändra alla dina data på webbplatser du besöker" medan du ber om behörighet. Denna utökning spårar inte eller använder din surfhistorik på något sätt. Den enda information den behöver är de aktiva tillstånden för flikarna. 

Copy & Paste Pro-utökningen "Enable Right Click" är en lösning för webbplatser som blockerar Copy, Paste, Select Text och Right Clicks.

- Denna utökning fungerar separat för varje flik. 
- Klicka på ikonen för utökningen för att aktivera / inaktivera den. 
- Utvidgningen inaktiveras vid sidladdning. 
- Kontrollera statusen aktiverad (grön bock) eller inaktiverad (grå bock) av utvidgningen på verktygsfältet (i högra hörnet).
 Aktivera högerklick - Begränsa kopia/SELECT är en applikation som gör det möjligt för användare att klippa, kopiera och klistra in via högerklick -menyer och bandverktygsfält när du använder kontor på webben. Att installera den här kostnadsfria förlängningen gör att du kan aktivera kopia, tillåt kopia, högerklicka, enkelt kopia, aktivera högerklicka, begränsa kopiering, kontextmeny och möjliggöra kopiering och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben via menyer. Denna förlängning fungerar oberoende för varje flik; Om du klickar på tilläggsikonen aktiverar/inaktiverar den. Tillägget inaktiveras på sidan om; Kontrollera statusen Enabled (Green Tick) eller inaktiverad (grå kryss) för förlängningen i verktygsfältet (övre högra hörnet). 
 
 På grund av begränsningar av webbläsare, kopiering och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben genom menyer kräver ytterligare behörigheter som tillhandahålls genom denna förlängning. Det låser upp kopia (på riktigt) och kommer ihåg vilka webbplatser som ska avblockeras för framtida besök. Denna förlängning spårar eller använder inte din surfhistorik på något sätt; Den enda informationen den behöver är de aktiva tillstånden för flikarna. 
 
 Se till att ladda om webbsidan efter installation av denna tillägg; Om du ändrar inställningarna måste några öppna flikar laddas om för att de ska träda i kraft. Eftersom förlängningen måste känna till de aktiva flikarna, så är det grundläggande tillståndet det kräver "flikar". Chrome kommer dock att märka det som "kan läsa och ändra alla dina data på webbplatser du besöker" medan du ber om tillstånd. Introduktion av den måste -ha -förlängningen: "Aktivera högerklick - Begränsa kopia/välj" 
 
 Är du trött på de begränsningar som webbläsare lägger när det gäller att kopiera och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben? Kolla inte vidare! Med den fria förlängningen "Aktivera högerklicka - Begränsa kopia/välj," Du kan nu släppa loss den fulla potentialen för dina kopierings- och klistrafunktioner. 
 
 Denna kraftfulla förlängning ger dig förmågan att klippa, kopiera och klistra in Enkelt användning av högerklick-menyer och bandverktygsfältet när du arbetar med Office på webben. Säg adjö till frustrerande begränsningar och hej till sömlös produktivitet. 
 
 "Aktivera högerklicka - Begränsa kopia/välj" fungerar oberoende för varje flik, vilket ger dig fullständig kontroll över din kopieringsupplevelse. Klicka bara på förlängningsikonen för att aktivera eller inaktivera den. Du hittar statusen för förlängningen bekvämt som visas i verktygsfältet i det övre högra hörnet - en grön fästing indikerar aktiverad, medan en grå fästing betecknar inaktiverad. 
 
 Men hur fungerar denna förlängning sin magi? Tja, på grund av vissa begränsningar som ligger i webbläsare krävs ytterligare behörigheter för att kopiera och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben via menyer. Det är här "Aktivera högerklicka - Begränsa kopia/välj" är praktiskt. Det låser upp den verkliga kraften i kopian (på riktigt) och till och med kommer ihåg vilka webbplatser som ska avblockeras för framtida besök. Var säker på att denna förlängning respekterar din integritet genom att inte spåra eller använda din surfhistorik på något sätt. Allt det behöver är kunskap om dina aktiva flikar. 
 
 För att fullt ut njuta av fördelarna med denna tillägg, se till att ladda om webbsidan efter installationen. Om du gör några ändringar i inställningarna, kom ihåg att alla öppna flikar måste laddas om för att de ska träda i kraft. Chrome kan begära tillstånd märkt som "kan läsa och ändra alla dina data på webbplatser du besöker", men rädsla inte - det är helt enkelt för att tillägget behöver åtkomst för att veta vilka flikar som är aktiva. 
 
 Upplev en helt ny nivå av Bekvämlighet och effektivitet med "Aktivera högerklicka - Begränsa kopia/välj." Låt inte webbläsarens begränsningar hålla dig tillbaka - ge dig själv att kopiera, klistra in och erövra med lätthet. Introduktion av Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Aktivera högerklick - Begränsa kopia/Välj 
 
 Är du trött på att vara begränsad från att kopiera och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben? Kolla inte vidare! Med den fria förlängningen, "Aktivera högerklick - Begränsa kopia/välj", kan du nu låsa upp kraften i klipp, kopia och klistra in genom högerklickmenyer och bandverktygsfältet. 
 
 Denna otroliga förlängning ger de ytterligare behörigheter som krävs för att aktivera kopiering och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben. Säg adjö till frustrerande begränsningar och hej till sömlös produktivitet. 
 
 En av de framstående funktioner i Aktivera högerklicka - Begränsa kopia/SELECT är dess förmåga att arbeta oberoende för varje flik. Klicka bara på förlängningsikonen för att aktivera eller inaktivera den. Dessutom behöver du aldrig oroa dig för att förlora dina inställningar eftersom tillägget automatiskt inaktiverar sig när SIDE LAST. Håll ett öga på statusen för förlängningen med ett snabbt blick på verktygsfältet i det övre högra hörnet. 
 
 Vi förstår att webbläsare har sina begränsningar när det gäller att kopiera och klistra in på Microsoft Office för webben. Det är därför denna förlängning är här för att rädda dagen. Det låser upp kopieringsfunktionalitet så att du verkligen kan släppa loss din produktivitetspotential. Och oroa dig inte, aktivera högerklicka - Begränsa kopia/välj respekterar din integritet genom att inte spåra eller använda din surfhistorik på något sätt. Det kräver bara åtkomst till de aktiva tillstånden på dina flikar. 
 
 För att säkerställa smidig drift, kom ihåg att ladda om din webbsida efter att du har installerat denna spelförändringsförlängning. Om du gör några ändringar i inställningarna, se till att ladda om alla öppna flikar för att de ska träda i kraft. Chrome kan begära tillstånd märkt som "kan läsa och ändra alla dina data på webbplatser du besöker", men var säker på att det helt enkelt behövs för att veta vilka flikar som är aktiva. 
 
 Säg adjö för att kopiera begränsningar och hej till en helhet Ny produktivitetsnivå med Aktivera högerklick - Begränsa kopia/SELECT. Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Enable copy and right-click on protected websites.

Usage:
- Click browser action icon to enter "copy mode" for current site
Features:
- Unlocks copy (for real)
- Remembers which site to unblock for future visits

---> Once this extension is installed you must reload any open tabs in order for it to work<---

MAKE SURE TO RELOAD THE WEBPAGE AFTER INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION .

- Since the extension needs to know the active tabs , so the basic permission it requires is "tabs" . But Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit " while asking for the permission .This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways.The only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Copy&Paste Pro extension "Enable Right Click" is a solution for websites that block Copy , Paste , Select Text and Right clicks .

- This extension works separately for each tab .

- The extension gets disabled on page reload .

Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for

Wezesha menyu ya muktadha na uchague, ruhusu kuchagua, ruhusu nakala, ruhusu kubonyeza kulia katika kurasa zilizozuiliwa. Ofisi kwenye Wavuti. Bonyeza kwenye Wavuti zilizolindwa. Je! Ni tovuti gani ya kufunguliwa kwa ziara za baadaye Badilisha Mipangilio ya Upanuzi Tabo yoyote wazi lazima ichukuliwe tena ili iweze kuchukua athari <---- 
 
 Hakikisha kupakia ukurasa wa wavuti baada ya kusanikisha ugani huu. Kujua tabo zinazotumika, kwa hivyo ruhusa ya msingi inahitaji ni "tabo". Lakini Chrome itaiita kama "inaweza kusoma na kubadilisha data yako yote kwenye wavuti unayotembelea" wakati unauliza ruhusa. Ugani huu haufuati au kutumia historia yako ya kuvinjari kwa njia yoyote. Habari pekee inayohitaji ni majimbo ya kazi ya tabo. > Kubonyeza kwenye ikoni ya ugani itaiwezesha/kuizima. kona). 
 Wezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/chagua ni programu ambayo inaruhusu watumiaji kukata, kunakili, na kubandika kupitia menyu ya kubonyeza kulia na vifaa vya Ribbon wakati wa kutumia ofisi kwenye wavuti. Kufunga ugani huu wa bure hukuwezesha kuwezesha nakala, ruhusu nakala, bonyeza kulia, nakala rahisi, wezesha kubonyeza kulia, zuia nakala, menyu ya muktadha, na ruhusu kunakili na kubandika katika Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa wavuti kupitia menyu. Ugani huu hufanya kazi kwa uhuru kwa kila kichupo; Kubonyeza kwenye ikoni ya ugani itawezesha/kuizima. Ugani hulemazwa kwenye Ukurasa wa kupakia tena; Angalia hali iliyowezeshwa (tick kijani) au walemavu (kijivu kijivu) cha ugani kwenye upau wa zana (kona ya juu kulia). 
 
 Kwa sababu ya mapungufu ya vivinjari vya wavuti, kunakili na kubandika katika Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa wavuti kupitia menyu inahitaji ruhusa za ziada ambazo hutolewa kupitia ugani huu. Inafungua nakala (kwa kweli) na inakumbuka ni tovuti zipi za kufunguliwa kwa ziara za baadaye. Ugani huu haufuati au kutumia historia yako ya kuvinjari kwa njia yoyote; Habari pekee inayohitaji ni majimbo ya kazi ya tabo. 
 
 Hakikisha kupakia tena ukurasa wa wavuti baada ya kusanikisha ugani huu; Ukibadilisha mipangilio tabo yoyote ya wazi lazima ipakiwa tena ili iweze kuanza. Kwa kuwa ugani unahitaji kujua tabo zinazotumika, kwa hivyo ruhusa ya msingi inahitaji ni "tabo". Walakini, Chrome itaiita kama "inaweza kusoma na kubadilisha data yako yote kwenye wavuti unazotembelea" wakati unauliza ruhusa. Kuanzisha ugani wa lazima: "Wezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/uchague" 
 Je! Umechoka na mapungufu yaliyowekwa na vivinjari vya wavuti linapokuja suala la kunakili na kubandika katika Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa Wavuti? Usiangalie zaidi! Na ugani wa bure, "Wezesha bonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/uchague," sasa unaweza kufungua uwezo kamili wa nakala zako na ubandike. 
 
 Ugani huu wenye nguvu unakupa uwezo wa kukata, kunakili, na kubandika Kutumia menyu ya kubonyeza kulia na upau wa zana ya Ribbon wakati unafanya kazi na ofisi kwenye wavuti. Sema kwaheri kwa vizuizi vya kufadhaisha na hello kwa tija isiyo na mshono. Bonyeza tu kwenye ikoni ya ugani ili kuwezesha au kuizima. Utapata hali ya ugani iliyoonyeshwa kwa urahisi kwenye upau wa zana kwenye kona ya juu ya kulia - tick ya kijani inaonyesha kuwezeshwa, wakati tick kijivu inaashiria walemavu. 
 
 Lakini ugani huu unafanyaje uchawi wake? Kweli, kwa sababu ya mapungufu fulani asili ya vivinjari vya wavuti, ruhusa za ziada zinahitajika kwa kunakili na kubandika katika Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa wavuti kupitia menyu. Hapa ndipo "Wezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/chagua" inakuja vizuri. Inafungua nguvu ya kweli ya nakala (kwa kweli) na hata inakumbuka ni tovuti zipi za kujiondoa kwa ziara za baadaye. Hakikisha, ugani huu unaheshimu faragha yako kwa kutofuatilia au kutumia historia yako ya kuvinjari kwa njia yoyote. Inayohitaji tu ni ufahamu wa tabo zako zinazotumika. Ikiwa utafanya mabadiliko yoyote kwa mipangilio, kumbuka kuwa tabo zote wazi lazima zipakiwa tena ili ziweze kuanza. Chrome inaweza kuomba ruhusa iliyoandikwa kama "inaweza kusoma na kubadilisha data yako yote kwenye wavuti unazotembelea," lakini usiogope - ni kwa sababu ugani unahitaji ufikiaji wa kujua ni tabo gani zinafanya kazi. Urahisi na ufanisi na "Wezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/chagua." Usiruhusu vizuizi vya kivinjari vikuzuie - jiwezeshe kuiga, kubandika, na kushinda kwa urahisi. Kuanzisha nakala ya mwisho na suluhisho la kubandika: Wezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/chagua 
 Je! Umechoka kwa kuzuiliwa kutoka kunakili na kubandika kwenye Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa Wavuti? Usiangalie zaidi! Kwa ugani wa bure, "Wezesha Bonyeza kulia - BONYEZA Nakala/Chagua", sasa unaweza kufungua nguvu ya kukatwa, kunakili, na kubandika kupitia menyu ya kubonyeza kulia na zana ya Ribbon. 
 
 Ugani huu wa ajabu hutoa ruhusa za ziada muhimu ili kuwezesha kunakili na kubandika katika Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa wavuti. Sema kwaheri kwa mapungufu ya kufadhaisha na hello kwa tija isiyo na mshono. 
 
 Moja ya sifa za kusimama za kuwezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/uchague ni uwezo wake wa kufanya kazi kwa uhuru kwa kila kichupo. Bonyeza tu kwenye ikoni ya ugani ili kuwezesha au kuizima. Pamoja, hautawahi kuwa na wasiwasi juu ya kupoteza mipangilio yako kwani ugani hujilemaza kiotomatiki kwenye Ukurasa wa kupakia tena. Weka jicho juu ya hali ya ugani na mtazamo wa haraka kwenye upau wa zana kwenye kona ya juu ya kulia. Ndio sababu ugani huu uko hapa kuokoa siku. Inafungua utendaji wa nakala ili uweze kufunua uwezo wako wa uzalishaji. Na usijali, Wezesha kubonyeza kulia - zuia nakala/uchague kuheshimu faragha yako kwa kutofuatilia au kutumia historia yako ya kuvinjari kwa njia yoyote. Inahitaji tu ufikiaji wa majimbo ya kazi ya tabo zako. Ikiwa utafanya mabadiliko yoyote kwa mipangilio, hakikisha kupakia tena tabo zote wazi ili ziweze kuanza. Chrome inaweza kuomba ruhusa iliyoandikwa kama "inaweza kusoma na kubadilisha data yako yote kwenye wavuti unazotembelea", lakini hakikisha kuwa inahitajika tu kujua ni tabo gani zinafanya kazi. 
 Sema kwaheri ili kunakili vizuizi na hello kwa ujumla Kiwango kipya cha tija na Wezesha Bonyeza kulia - Zuia nakala/chagua. Usikose juu ya ugani huu wa lazima ambao utabadilisha njia unayofanya kazi katika Ofisi ya Microsoft kwa wavuti. కాంటెక్స్ట్ మెనుని ప్రారంభించండి మరియు ఎంచుకోండి, ఎంచుకోండి, కాపీని అనుమతించండి, పరిమితం చేయబడిన పేజీలలో కుడి క్లిక్ చేయడానికి అనుమతించండి. వెబ్‌లో ఆఫీస్. రక్షిత వెబ్‌సైట్‌లపై క్లిక్ చేయండి. 
 
 ఉపయోగం: 
- ప్రస్తుత సైట్ కోసం "కాపీ మోడ్" ను నమోదు చేయడానికి బ్రౌజర్ చర్య చిహ్నాన్ని క్లిక్ చేయండి భవిష్యత్ సందర్శనల కోసం ఏ సైట్‌ను అన్‌బ్లాక్ చేయాలి 
 
 ---> ఈ పొడిగింపు ఇన్‌స్టాల్ చేయబడిన తర్వాత మీరు పని చేయడానికి ఏదైనా ఓపెన్ ట్యాబ్‌లను రీలోడ్ చేయాలి <--- 
 
 ---> మీరు అయితే మీరు అయితే పొడిగింపు సెట్టింగులను మార్చండి సెట్టింగులను మార్చండి <---- 
 
 ఈ పొడిగింపును ఇన్‌స్టాల్ చేసిన తర్వాత వెబ్‌పేజీని మళ్లీ లోడ్ చేయాలని నిర్ధారించుకోండి. 
 
-పొడిగింపు అవసరం ఎందుకంటే-పొడిగింపు అవసరం క్రియాశీల ట్యాబ్‌లను తెలుసుకోవటానికి, కాబట్టి దీనికి అవసరమైన ప్రాథమిక అనుమతి "ట్యాబ్‌లు". అనుమతి అడుగుతున్నప్పుడు Chrome దీనిని "మీరు సందర్శించే వెబ్‌సైట్లలో మీ మొత్తం డేటాను చదవగలదు మరియు మార్చగలదు" అని లేబుల్ చేస్తుంది .ఈ పొడిగింపు మీ బ్రౌజింగ్ చరిత్రను ఏ విధంగానూ ట్రాక్ చేయదు లేదా ఉపయోగించదు. దీనికి అవసరమైన ఏకైక సమాచారం యొక్క క్రియాశీల రాష్ట్రాలు మాత్రమే ట్యాబ్‌లు. 
 
 ప్రో ఎక్స్‌టెన్షన్‌ను కాపీ & పేస్ట్ చేయండి "ఎనేబుల్ కుడి క్లిక్" అనేది బ్లాక్ కాపీ, పేస్ట్, టెక్స్ట్ మరియు కుడి క్లిక్‌లను ఎంచుకోండి. 
 
- ఈ పొడిగింపు ప్రతి ట్యాబ్‌కు విడిగా పనిచేస్తుంది. 
-- పొడిగింపు చిహ్నంపై క్లిక్ చేస్తే దాన్ని ప్రారంభిస్తుంది/నిలిపివేస్తుంది. 
- పేజీ రీలోడ్‌లో పొడిగింపు నిలిపివేయబడుతుంది. మూలలో). . ఈ ఉచిత పొడిగింపును ఇన్‌స్టాల్ చేయడం వలన కాపీని ప్రారంభించడానికి, కాపీని అనుమతించండి, కుడి క్లిక్, సాధారణ కాపీని అనుమతించండి, కుడి క్లిక్ ప్రారంభించండి, కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి, కాపీ, కాంటెక్స్ట్ మెనుని పరిమితం చేయండి మరియు మెనూల ద్వారా వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ ఆఫీస్లో కాపీ చేయడానికి మరియు అతికించడానికి అనుమతిస్తుంది. ఈ పొడిగింపు ప్రతి ట్యాబ్‌కు స్వతంత్రంగా పనిచేస్తుంది; పొడిగింపు చిహ్నంపై క్లిక్ చేస్తే దాన్ని ప్రారంభిస్తుంది/నిలిపివేస్తుంది. పేజీ రీలోడ్‌లో పొడిగింపు నిలిపివేయబడుతుంది; టూల్‌బార్ (ఎగువ కుడి మూలలో) పొడిగింపు యొక్క స్థితి (గ్రీన్ టిక్) లేదా డిసేబుల్ (గ్రే టిక్) ను తనిఖీ చేయండి. 
 
 వెబ్ బ్రౌజర్‌ల పరిమితుల కారణంగా, మెనుల ద్వారా వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ ఆఫీస్లో కాపీ చేయడం మరియు అతికించడం వల్ల ఈ పొడిగింపు ద్వారా అందించబడే అదనపు అనుమతులు అవసరం. ఇది కాపీని అన్‌లాక్ చేస్తుంది (వాస్తవమైనది) మరియు భవిష్యత్ సందర్శనల కోసం ఏ సైట్‌లను అన్‌బ్లాక్ చేయాలో గుర్తుంచుకుంటుంది. ఈ పొడిగింపు మీ బ్రౌజింగ్ చరిత్రను ఏ విధంగానూ ట్రాక్ చేయదు లేదా ఉపయోగించదు; దీనికి అవసరమైన ఏకైక సమాచారం ట్యాబ్‌ల యొక్క క్రియాశీల స్థితులు. 
 
 ఈ పొడిగింపును ఇన్‌స్టాల్ చేసిన తర్వాత వెబ్‌పేజీని మళ్లీ లోడ్ చేయాలని నిర్ధారించుకోండి; మీరు సెట్టింగులను మార్చినట్లయితే, ఏదైనా ఓపెన్ ట్యాబ్‌లు అమలులోకి రావడానికి అవి రీలోడ్ చేయబడాలి. పొడిగింపు క్రియాశీల ట్యాబ్‌లను తెలుసుకోవాలి కాబట్టి, దీనికి అవసరమైన ప్రాథమిక అనుమతి "ట్యాబ్‌లు". ఏదేమైనా, CHROME దీనిని అనుమతి అడుగుతున్నప్పుడు "మీరు సందర్శించే వెబ్‌సైట్లలో మీ మొత్తం డేటాను చదవగలదు మరియు మార్చగలదు" అని లేబుల్ చేస్తుంది. తప్పనిసరిగా పొడిగింపును పరిచయం చేస్తోంది: "కుడి క్లిక్ ప్రారంభించండి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి" 
 
 వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ ఆఫీస్లో కాపీ చేయడం మరియు అతికించడం విషయానికి వస్తే వెబ్ బ్రౌజర్‌లు విధించిన పరిమితులతో మీరు విసిగిపోయారా? ఇంకేమీ చూడండి! ఉచిత పొడిగింపుతో, "కుడి క్లిక్ చేయండి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి," మీరు ఇప్పుడు మీ కాపీ మరియు పేస్ట్ ఫంక్షన్ల యొక్క పూర్తి సామర్థ్యాన్ని విప్పవచ్చు. వెబ్‌లో కార్యాలయంతో పనిచేసేటప్పుడు అప్రయత్నంగా కుడి-క్లిక్ మెనూలు మరియు రిబ్బన్ టూల్‌బార్‌ను ఉపయోగించడం. నిరాశపరిచే పరిమితులకు వీడ్కోలు చెప్పండి మరియు అతుకులు లేని ఉత్పాదకతకు హలో. దాన్ని ప్రారంభించడానికి లేదా నిలిపివేయడానికి పొడిగింపు చిహ్నంపై క్లిక్ చేయండి. ఎగువ కుడి మూలలోని టూల్‌బార్‌లో సౌకర్యవంతంగా ప్రదర్శించబడే పొడిగింపు యొక్క స్థితిని మీరు కనుగొంటారు - గ్రీన్ టిక్ ఎనేబుల్ చేయబడిందని సూచిస్తుంది, అయితే బూడిదరంగు టిక్ నిలిపివేయబడిందని సూచిస్తుంది. 
 
 కానీ ఈ పొడిగింపు దాని మేజిక్ ఎలా పని చేస్తుంది? బాగా, వెబ్ బ్రౌజర్‌లకు అంతర్లీనంగా ఉన్న కొన్ని పరిమితుల కారణంగా, మెనుల ద్వారా వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ కార్యాలయంలో కాపీ మరియు అతికించడానికి అదనపు అనుమతులు అవసరం. ఇక్కడే "కుడి క్లిక్ ప్రారంభించండి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి" ఉపయోగపడుతుంది. ఇది కాపీ యొక్క నిజమైన శక్తిని అన్‌లాక్ చేస్తుంది (వాస్తవమైనది) మరియు భవిష్యత్ సందర్శనల కోసం ఏ సైట్‌లను అన్‌బ్లాక్ చేయాలో కూడా గుర్తు చేస్తుంది. మీ బ్రౌజింగ్ చరిత్రను ఏ విధంగానైనా ట్రాక్ చేయకుండా లేదా ఉపయోగించడం ద్వారా ఈ పొడిగింపు మీ గోప్యతను గౌరవిస్తుంది. దీనికి కావలసిందల్లా మీ క్రియాశీల ట్యాబ్‌ల పరిజ్ఞానం. 
 
 ఈ పొడిగింపు యొక్క ప్రయోజనాలను పూర్తిగా ఆస్వాదించడానికి, సంస్థాపన తర్వాత వెబ్‌పేజీని మళ్లీ లోడ్ చేయండి. మీరు సెట్టింగులలో ఏవైనా మార్పులు చేస్తే, అన్ని ఓపెన్ ట్యాబ్‌లు అమలులోకి రావడానికి రీలోడ్ చేయబడాలని గుర్తుంచుకోండి. Chrome "మీరు సందర్శించే వెబ్‌సైట్లలో మీ మొత్తం డేటాను చదవగలదు మరియు మార్చగలదు" అని లేబుల్ చేయబడిన అనుమతిని అభ్యర్థించవచ్చు, కాని భయపడకండి - ఇది ఏ ట్యాబ్‌లు చురుకుగా ఉన్నాయో తెలుసుకోవడానికి పొడిగింపుకు ప్రాప్యత అవసరం. 
 
 సరికొత్త స్థాయిని అనుభవించండి సౌలభ్యం మరియు సామర్థ్యం "కుడి క్లిక్ ప్రారంభించండి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి." బ్రౌజర్ పరిమితులు మిమ్మల్ని వెనక్కి తీసుకోనివ్వవద్దు - కాపీ చేయడానికి, అతికించడానికి మరియు జయించటానికి మిమ్మల్ని మీరు శక్తివంతం చేయండి. అల్టిమేట్ కాపీ మరియు పేస్ట్ పరిష్కారాన్ని పరిచయం చేస్తోంది: కుడి క్లిక్ ప్రారంభించండి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/
 
 ఎంచుకోండి మీరు వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ ఆఫీస్లో కాపీ చేసి అతికించకుండా పరిమితం చేయబడతారా? ఇంకేమీ చూడండి! ఉచిత పొడిగింపుతో, "కుడి క్లిక్ చేయండి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి", మీరు ఇప్పుడు కుడి -క్లిక్ మెనూలు మరియు రిబ్బన్ టూల్‌బార్ ద్వారా కట్, కాపీ మరియు అతికించని శక్తిని అన్‌లాక్ చేయవచ్చు. 
 
 ఈ అద్భుతమైన పొడిగింపు వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ ఆఫీస్లో కాపీ మరియు అతికించడం ప్రారంభించడానికి అవసరమైన అదనపు అనుమతులను అందిస్తుంది. నిరాశపరిచే పరిమితులకు వీడ్కోలు చెప్పండి మరియు అతుకులు లేని ఉత్పాదకతకు హలో చెప్పండి. . దాన్ని ప్రారంభించడానికి లేదా నిలిపివేయడానికి పొడిగింపు చిహ్నంపై క్లిక్ చేయండి. అదనంగా, పేజీ రీలోడ్ మీద పొడిగింపు స్వయంచాలకంగా నిలిపివేస్తుంది కాబట్టి మీరు మీ సెట్టింగులను కోల్పోవడం గురించి ఆందోళన చెందాల్సిన అవసరం లేదు. కుడి ఎగువ మూలలోని టూల్‌బార్‌ను శీఘ్రంగా చూస్తూ పొడిగింపు యొక్క స్థితిపై నిఘా ఉంచండి. అందుకే రోజును ఆదా చేయడానికి ఈ పొడిగింపు ఇక్కడ ఉంది. ఇది కాపీ కార్యాచరణను అన్‌లాక్ చేస్తుంది కాబట్టి మీరు మీ ఉత్పాదకత సామర్థ్యాన్ని నిజంగా విప్పవచ్చు. చింతించకండి, కుడి క్లిక్ ప్రారంభించండి - మీ బ్రౌజింగ్ చరిత్రను ట్రాక్ చేయకపోవడం ద్వారా లేదా ఉపయోగించడం ద్వారా కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి మీ గోప్యతను ఏ విధంగానైనా ఉపయోగించండి. దీనికి మీ ట్యాబ్‌ల యొక్క క్రియాశీల స్థితులకు మాత్రమే ప్రాప్యత అవసరం. 
 
 సున్నితమైన ఆపరేషన్‌ను నిర్ధారించడానికి, ఈ ఆట మారుతున్న పొడిగింపును ఇన్‌స్టాల్ చేసిన తర్వాత మీ వెబ్‌పేజీని మళ్లీ లోడ్ చేయడం గుర్తుంచుకోండి. మీరు సెట్టింగులలో ఏవైనా మార్పులు చేస్తే, అవి అమలులోకి రావడానికి అన్ని ఓపెన్ ట్యాబ్‌లను మళ్లీ లోడ్ చేయండి. Chrome "మీరు సందర్శించే వెబ్‌సైట్లలో మీ మొత్తం డేటాను చదవగలదు మరియు మార్చగలదు" అని లేబుల్ చేయబడిన అనుమతిని అభ్యర్థించవచ్చు, కాని మిగిలినవి ఏ ట్యాబ్‌లు చురుకుగా ఉన్నాయో తెలుసుకోవడం అవసరమని హామీ ఇచ్చారు. 
 
 పరిమితులను కాపీ చేయడానికి వీడ్కోలు చెప్పండి మరియు మొత్తానికి హలో రైట్ క్లిక్ ఎనేబుల్ తో ఉత్పాదకత యొక్క కొత్త స్థాయి - కాపీని పరిమితం చేయండి/ఎంచుకోండి. వెబ్ కోసం మైక్రోసాఫ్ట్ ఆఫీస్లో మీరు పనిచేసే విధానంలో విప్లవాత్మకమైన ఈ పొడిగింపును కోల్పోకండి. మునుపెన్నడూ లేని విధంగా కాపీ మరియు పేస్ట్ యొక్క శక్తిని విప్పడానికి సిద్ధంగా ఉండండి. enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, allow

Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

Say goodbye to copy restrictions and hello to a whole new level of productivity with Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select. Don't miss out on this must-have extension that will revolutionize the way you work in Microsoft Office for the web. Get ready to unleash the power of copy and paste like never before.
long.th:
เปิดใช้งานเมนูบริบทและเลือกอนุญาตให้เลือกอนุญาตคัดลอกอนุญาตให้คลิกขวาในหน้าเว็บที่ จำกัด 
 
 การติดตั้งส่วนขยายฟรีนี้ช่วยให้คุณสามารถตัดคัดลอกและวางผ่านเมนูคลิกขวาและแถบเครื่องมือริบบิ้นเมื่อใช้งาน สำนักงานบนเว็บ 
 
 เนื่องจากข้อ จำกัด ของเว็บเบราว์เซอร์การคัดลอกและวางใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บผ่านเมนูต้องได้รับอนุญาตเพิ่มเติมซึ่งให้ผ่านส่วนขยายนี้ 
 
 เปิดใช้งานการคัดลอกและขวา- คลิกที่เว็บไซต์ที่ได้รับการป้องกัน 
 
 การใช้งาน: 
- คลิกไอคอนการกระทำของเบราว์เซอร์เพื่อเข้าสู่ "โหมดคัดลอก" สำหรับไซต์ปัจจุบัน 
 คุณสมบัติ: 
- ปลดล็อคสำเนา (ของจริง) 
- จดจำ ไซต์ใดที่จะปลดล็อคสำหรับการเข้าชมในอนาคต 
 
 ---> เมื่อติดตั้งส่วนขยายนี้แล้วคุณต้องโหลดแท็บที่เปิดใหม่เพื่อให้ทำงานได้ <--- 
 
 ---> หากคุณ เปลี่ยนการตั้งค่าส่วนขยายใด ๆ แท็บที่เปิดอยู่จะต้องโหลดซ้ำเพื่อให้พวกเขามีผล <---- 
 
 ตรวจสอบให้แน่ใจว่าได้โหลดหน้าเว็บใหม่หลังจากติดตั้งส่วนขยายนี้ 
 
-เนื่องจากความต้องการส่วนขยาย หากต้องการทราบแท็บที่ใช้งานอยู่ดังนั้นการอนุญาตพื้นฐานที่ต้องการคือ "แท็บ" แต่ Chrome จะติดป้ายว่า "สามารถอ่านและเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อมูลทั้งหมดของคุณบนเว็บไซต์ที่คุณเยี่ยมชม" ในขณะที่ขออนุญาตส่วนขยายนี้ไม่ได้ติดตามหรือใช้ประวัติการเรียกดูของคุณในทุกวิธี แท็บ 
 
 การคัดลอกและวางส่วนขยาย Pro "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา" เป็นวิธีแก้ปัญหาสำหรับเว็บไซต์ที่บล็อกคัดลอกวางเลือกข้อความและคลิกขวา 
 
- ส่วนขยายนี้ทำงานแยกต่างหากสำหรับแต่ละแท็บ 
- การคลิกที่ไอคอนส่วนขยายจะเปิดใช้งาน/ปิดใช้งาน 
- ส่วนขยายจะถูกปิดใช้งานในหน้าโหลดใหม่ 
- ตรวจสอบสถานะที่เปิดใช้งาน (เห็บสีเขียว) หรือปิดใช้งาน (เห็บสีเทา) ของส่วนขยายบนแถบเครื่องมือ (ขวาบนขวา มุม). 
 เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือกเป็นแอปพลิเคชันที่อนุญาตให้ผู้ใช้ตัดคัดลอกและวางผ่านเมนูคลิกขวาและแถบเครื่องมือริบบิ้นเมื่อใช้สำนักงานบนเว็บ การติดตั้งส่วนขยายฟรีนี้ช่วยให้คุณเปิดใช้งานการคัดลอกอนุญาตให้คัดลอกคลิกขวาคัดลอกง่ายเปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา, จำกัด การคัดลอก, เมนูบริบทและอนุญาตให้คัดลอกและวางใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บผ่านเมนู ส่วนขยายนี้ทำงานได้อย่างอิสระสำหรับแต่ละแท็บ การคลิกที่ไอคอนส่วนขยายจะเปิดใช้งาน/ปิดการใช้งาน ส่วนขยายจะถูกปิดใช้งานในการโหลดหน้าใหม่ ตรวจสอบสถานะที่เปิดใช้งาน (เห็บสีเขียว) หรือปิดใช้งาน (เห็บสีเทา) ของส่วนขยายบนแถบเครื่องมือ (มุมบนขวา) 
 
 เนื่องจากข้อ จำกัด ของเว็บเบราว์เซอร์การคัดลอกและวางใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บผ่านเมนูต้องได้รับอนุญาตเพิ่มเติมซึ่งให้ผ่านส่วนขยายนี้ มันปลดล็อคสำเนา (สำหรับจริง) และจำได้ว่าไซต์ใดที่จะปลดบล็อกสำหรับการเยี่ยมชมในอนาคต ส่วนขยายนี้ไม่ได้ติดตามหรือใช้ประวัติการเรียกดูของคุณในทุก ๆ ด้าน ข้อมูลเดียวที่ต้องการคือสถานะที่ใช้งานอยู่ของแท็บ 
 
 ตรวจสอบให้แน่ใจว่าได้โหลดหน้าเว็บใหม่หลังจากติดตั้งส่วนขยายนี้ หากคุณเปลี่ยนการตั้งค่าแท็บเปิดใด ๆ จะต้องโหลดซ้ำเพื่อให้พวกเขามีผล เนื่องจากส่วนขยายจำเป็นต้องรู้แท็บที่ใช้งานอยู่ดังนั้นการอนุญาตพื้นฐานที่ต้องการคือ "แท็บ" อย่างไรก็ตาม Chrome จะติดป้ายว่า "สามารถอ่านและเปลี่ยนข้อมูลทั้งหมดของคุณบนเว็บไซต์ที่คุณเยี่ยมชม" ในขณะที่ขออนุญาต แนะนำส่วนขยายที่ต้องมี: "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก" 
 
 คุณเบื่อกับข้อ จำกัด ที่กำหนดโดยเว็บเบราว์เซอร์เมื่อพูดถึงการคัดลอกและวางในสำนักงาน Microsoft สำหรับเว็บหรือไม่? ไม่มองหาอีก! ด้วยส่วนขยายฟรี "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก" ตอนนี้คุณสามารถปลดปล่อยศักยภาพของฟังก์ชั่นสำเนาและวางของคุณได้ 
 
 ส่วนขยายอันทรงพลังนี้ให้ความสามารถในการตัดคัดลอกและวาง ใช้เมนูคลิกขวาและแถบเครื่องมือริบบิ้นอย่างง่ายดายในขณะที่ทำงานกับสำนักงานบนเว็บ กล่าวคำอำลากับข้อ จำกัด ที่น่าหงุดหงิดและสวัสดีถึงผลผลิตที่ราบรื่น 
 
 "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก" ทำงานได้อย่างอิสระสำหรับแต่ละแท็บให้คุณควบคุมประสบการณ์การคัดลอกของคุณได้อย่างสมบูรณ์ เพียงคลิกที่ไอคอนส่วนขยายเพื่อเปิดใช้งานหรือปิดการใช้งาน คุณจะพบสถานะของส่วนขยายที่แสดงอย่างสะดวกบนแถบเครื่องมือที่มุมบนขวา - เห็บสีเขียวบ่งชี้ว่าเปิดใช้งานในขณะที่เห็บสีเทาหมายถึงปิดใช้งาน 
 
 แต่ส่วนขยายนี้ใช้งานได้อย่างไร? เนื่องจากข้อ จำกัด บางประการที่มีอยู่ในเว็บเบราว์เซอร์จึงจำเป็นต้องมีการอนุญาตเพิ่มเติมสำหรับการคัดลอกและวางใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บผ่านเมนู นี่คือที่ "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก" มีประโยชน์ มันปลดล็อคพลังที่แท้จริงของการคัดลอก (สำหรับจริง) และแม้กระทั่งจำได้ว่าไซต์ใดที่จะปลดบล็อกสำหรับการเยี่ยมชมในอนาคต มั่นใจได้ว่าส่วนขยายนี้เคารพความเป็นส่วนตัวของคุณโดยไม่ติดตามหรือใช้ประวัติการเรียกดูของคุณในทางใดทางหนึ่ง สิ่งที่ต้องการคือความรู้เกี่ยวกับแท็บที่ใช้งานของคุณ 
 
 เพื่อให้ได้ประโยชน์อย่างเต็มที่จากส่วนขยายนี้ให้แน่ใจว่าได้โหลดหน้าเว็บใหม่หลังจากการติดตั้ง หากคุณทำการเปลี่ยนแปลงการตั้งค่าใด ๆ โปรดจำไว้ว่าแท็บที่เปิดทั้งหมดจะต้องโหลดใหม่เพื่อให้พวกเขามีผล Chrome อาจขออนุญาตที่ระบุว่า "สามารถอ่านและเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อมูลทั้งหมดของคุณบนเว็บไซต์ที่คุณเยี่ยมชม" แต่ไม่ต้องกลัว - เป็นเพียงเพราะส่วนขยายจำเป็นต้องเข้าถึงรู้ว่าแท็บใดทำงานอยู่ 
 
 สัมผัสกับระดับใหม่ทั้งหมด ความสะดวกและประสิทธิภาพด้วย "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก" อย่าปล่อยให้ข้อ จำกัด ของเบราว์เซอร์รั้งคุณไว้ - ช่วยให้ตัวเองคัดลอกวางและพิชิตได้อย่างง่ายดาย แนะนำวิธีแก้ปัญหาการคัดลอกและวางขั้นสูงสุด: เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก 
 
 คุณเบื่อที่จะถูก จำกัด จากการคัดลอกและวางบน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บหรือไม่? ไม่มองหาอีก! ด้วยส่วนขยายฟรี "เปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก" ตอนนี้คุณสามารถปลดล็อกพลังของการตัดคัดลอกและวางผ่านเมนูคลิกขวาและแถบเครื่องมือริบบิ้น 
 
 ส่วนขยายที่น่าทึ่งนี้ให้สิทธิ์เพิ่มเติมที่จำเป็นในการเปิดใช้งานการคัดลอกและวางใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บ กล่าวคำอำลากับข้อ จำกัด ที่น่าหงุดหงิดและสวัสดีถึงผลผลิตที่ราบรื่น 
 
 หนึ่งในคุณสมบัติที่โดดเด่นของการเปิดใช้งานการคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือกคือความสามารถในการทำงานอย่างอิสระสำหรับแต่ละแท็บ เพียงคลิกที่ไอคอนส่วนขยายเพื่อเปิดใช้งานหรือปิดการใช้งาน นอกจากนี้คุณจะไม่ต้องกังวลเกี่ยวกับการสูญเสียการตั้งค่าของคุณเนื่องจากส่วนขยายปิดใช้งานตัวเองโดยอัตโนมัติเมื่อโหลดหน้าใหม่ จับตาดูสถานะของการขยายอย่างรวดเร็วที่แถบเครื่องมือที่มุมบนขวา 
 
 เราเข้าใจว่าเว็บเบราว์เซอร์มีข้อ จำกัด เมื่อพูดถึงการคัดลอกและวางใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บ นั่นเป็นเหตุผลที่ส่วนขยายนี้อยู่ที่นี่เพื่อบันทึกวัน มันปลดล็อกฟังก์ชั่นการคัดลอกเพื่อให้คุณสามารถปลดปล่อยศักยภาพในการผลิตของคุณได้อย่างแท้จริง และไม่ต้องกังวลเปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือกเคารพความเป็นส่วนตัวของคุณโดยไม่ติดตามหรือใช้ประวัติการเรียกดูของคุณในทางใดทางหนึ่ง มันต้องการการเข้าถึงสถานะที่ใช้งานอยู่ของแท็บของคุณเท่านั้น 
 
 เพื่อให้แน่ใจว่าการทำงานที่ราบรื่นอย่าลืมโหลดหน้าเว็บของคุณใหม่หลังจากติดตั้งส่วนขยายที่เปลี่ยนเกมนี้ หากคุณทำการเปลี่ยนแปลงการตั้งค่าใด ๆ ให้แน่ใจว่าได้โหลดแท็บที่เปิดทั้งหมดใหม่เพื่อให้พวกเขามีผล Chrome อาจขออนุญาตที่ระบุว่า "สามารถอ่านและเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อมูลทั้งหมดของคุณบนเว็บไซต์ที่คุณเยี่ยมชม" แต่มั่นใจได้ว่าจำเป็นต้องรู้ว่าแท็บใดที่ใช้งานอยู่ 
 
 กล่าวคำอำลาเพื่อคัดลอกข้อ จำกัด และสวัสดี ระดับการผลิตใหม่ด้วยการเปิดใช้งานคลิกขวา - จำกัด การคัดลอก/เลือก อย่าพลาดส่วนขยายที่ต้องมีซึ่งจะปฏิวัติวิธีการทำงานของคุณใน Microsoft Office สำหรับเว็บ เตรียมพร้อมที่จะปลดปล่อยพลังของการคัดลอกและวางอย่างที่ไม่เคยมีมาก่อน enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, allow

Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select." Don't let browser restrictions hold you back – empower yourself to copy, paste, and conquer with ease.Introducing the Ultimate Copy and Paste Solution: Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select

Are you tired of being restricted from copying and pasting on Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select", you can now unlock the power of cut, copy, and paste through right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar. 

This incredible extension provides the additional permissions necessary to enable copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. Say goodbye to frustrating limitations and hello to seamless productivity. 

One of the standout features of Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is its ability to work independently for each tab. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. Plus, you'll never have to worry about losing your settings as the extension automatically disables itself upon page reload. Keep an eye on the status of the extension with a quick glance at the toolbar in the top right corner.

We understand that web browsers have their limitations when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web. That's why this extension is here to save the day. It unlocks copy functionality so you can truly unleash your productivity potential. And don't worry, Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select respects your privacy by not tracking or using your browsing history in any way. It only requires access to the active states of your tabs.

To ensure smooth operation, remember to reload your webpage after installing this game-changing extension. If you make any changes to the settings, be sure to reload all open tabs for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit", but rest assured that it's simply needed to know which tabs are active.

Say goodbye to copy restrictions and hello to a whole new level of productivity with Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select. Don't miss out on this must-have extension that will revolutionize the way you work in Microsoft Office for the web. Get ready to unleash the power of copy and paste like never before.

Bật menu ngữ cảnh và chọn, cho phép chọn, cho phép sao chép, cho phép nhấp chuột phải vào các trang bị hạn chế. Văn phòng trên web. Nhấp vào các trang web được bảo vệ. Trang web nào sẽ bỏ chặn cho các lượt truy cập trong tương lai 
 
 ---> Sau khi tiện ích mở rộng này được cài đặt, bạn phải tải lại bất kỳ tab mở nào để nó hoạt động <--- <r> 
 ---> nếu bạn Thay đổi cài đặt tiện ích mở rộng Mọi tab mở phải được tải lại để chúng có hiệu lực <---- <r> 
 Đảm bảo tải lại trang web sau khi cài đặt tiện ích mở rộng này. 
 
-Vì nhu cầu mở rộng Để biết các tab hoạt động, vì vậy sự cho phép cơ bản mà nó yêu cầu là "tab". Nhưng Chrome sẽ gắn nhãn nó là "có thể đọc và thay đổi tất cả dữ liệu của bạn trên các trang web bạn truy cập" trong khi xin phép. Tiện ích mở rộng này không theo dõi hoặc sử dụng lịch sử duyệt của bạn theo bất kỳ cách nào. tab. 
 
 Sao chép & dán tiện ích mở rộng "Bật nhấp chuột phải" là một giải pháp cho các trang web chặn sao chép, dán, chọn văn bản và nhấp chuột phải. 
 
- tiện ích mở rộng này hoạt động riêng cho mỗi tab. Nhấp vào biểu tượng tiện ích mở rộng sẽ bật/tắt nó. 
- Phần mở rộng bị vô hiệu hóa trên trang. góc). 
 Kích hoạt nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế Sao chép/Chọn là một ứng dụng cho phép người dùng cắt, sao chép và dán qua các thanh công cụ nhấp chuột và công cụ ruy băng bên phải khi sử dụng Office trên web. Cài đặt tiện ích mở rộng miễn phí này cho phép bạn bật sao chép, cho phép sao chép, nhấp chuột phải, bản sao đơn giản, kích hoạt nhấp chuột phải, hạn chế bản sao, menu ngữ cảnh và cho phép sao chép và dán trong Microsoft Office cho web thông qua menu. Phần mở rộng này hoạt động độc lập cho mỗi tab; Nhấp vào biểu tượng tiện ích mở rộng sẽ bật/tắt nó. Tiện ích mở rộng bị vô hiệu hóa trên trang tải lại; Kiểm tra trạng thái được bật (đánh dấu màu xanh lá cây) hoặc bị vô hiệu hóa (đánh dấu màu xám) của phần mở rộng trên thanh công cụ (góc trên bên phải). 
 
 Do những hạn chế của trình duyệt web, sao chép và dán trong Microsoft Office cho web thông qua các menu yêu cầu các quyền bổ sung được cung cấp thông qua tiện ích mở rộng này. Nó mở khóa bản sao (thực tế) và nhớ các trang web nào sẽ bỏ chặn cho các lượt truy cập trong tương lai. Tiện ích mở rộng này không theo dõi hoặc sử dụng lịch sử duyệt web của bạn theo bất kỳ cách nào; Thông tin duy nhất nó cần là các trạng thái hoạt động của các tab. 
 
 Đảm bảo tải lại trang web sau khi cài đặt tiện ích mở rộng này; Nếu bạn thay đổi cài đặt, bất kỳ tab mở nào cũng phải được tải lại để chúng có hiệu lực. Vì tiện ích mở rộng cần biết các tab hoạt động, nên sự cho phép cơ bản mà nó yêu cầu là "tab". Tuy nhiên, Chrome sẽ gắn nhãn nó là "có thể đọc và thay đổi tất cả dữ liệu của bạn trên các trang web bạn truy cập" trong khi xin phép. Giới thiệu tiện ích mở rộng phải có: "Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế sao chép/Chọn" 
 
 Bạn có mệt mỏi với những hạn chế được áp đặt bởi các trình duyệt web khi nói đến việc sao chép và dán trong Microsoft Office cho web không? Không tìm đâu xa! Với tiện ích mở rộng miễn phí, "Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế Sao chép/Chọn" Dễ dàng sử dụng các menu nhấp chuột phải và thanh công cụ Ribbon khi làm việc với Office trên web. Nói lời tạm biệt với các hạn chế bực bội và xin chào năng suất liền mạch. Chỉ cần nhấp vào biểu tượng tiện ích mở rộng để bật hoặc vô hiệu hóa nó. Bạn sẽ tìm thấy trạng thái của tiện ích mở rộng được hiển thị thuận tiện trên thanh công cụ ở góc trên cùng bên phải - một đánh dấu màu xanh lá cây cho biết được bật, trong khi một đánh dấu màu xám biểu thị bị vô hiệu hóa. 
 
 Nhưng phần mở rộng này hoạt động như thế nào? Vâng, do những hạn chế nhất định vốn có đối với các trình duyệt web, cần có các quyền bổ sung để sao chép và dán trong Microsoft Office cho Web thông qua các menu. Đây là nơi "Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế sao chép/chọn" có ích. Nó mở khóa sức mạnh thực sự của bản sao (thực tế) và thậm chí còn nhớ các trang web nào sẽ bỏ chặn cho các chuyến thăm trong tương lai. Hãy yên tâm, phần mở rộng này tôn trọng quyền riêng tư của bạn bằng cách không theo dõi hoặc sử dụng lịch sử duyệt web của bạn theo bất kỳ cách nào. Tất cả những gì nó cần là kiến thức về các tab hoạt động của bạn. Nếu bạn thực hiện bất kỳ thay đổi nào đối với cài đặt, hãy nhớ rằng tất cả các tab mở phải được tải lại để chúng có hiệu lực. Chrome có thể yêu cầu quyền được dán nhãn là "có thể đọc và thay đổi tất cả dữ liệu của bạn trên các trang web bạn truy cập", nhưng đừng sợ - đơn giản là vì tiện ích mở rộng cần truy cập để biết các tab đang hoạt động. 
 
 Trải nghiệm một cấp độ hoàn toàn mới của Thuận tiện và hiệu quả với "Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế Sao chép/Chọn." Đừng để các hạn chế trình duyệt giữ bạn lại - trao quyền cho bản thân để sao chép, dán và chinh phục một cách dễ dàng. Giới thiệu giải pháp bản sao và dán cuối cùng: Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế sao chép/Chọn 
 
 Bạn có mệt mỏi vì bị hạn chế sao chép và dán trên Microsoft Office cho web không? Không tìm đâu xa! Với tiện ích mở rộng miễn phí, "Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế sao chép/Chọn", giờ đây bạn có thể mở khóa sức mạnh của cắt, sao chép và dán qua các menu nhấp chuột phải và thanh công cụ Ribbon. 
 
 Phần mở rộng đáng kinh ngạc này cung cấp các quyền bổ sung cần thiết để cho phép sao chép và dán trong Microsoft Office cho web. Nói lời tạm biệt với những hạn chế bực bội và xin chào năng suất liền mạch. 
 
 Một trong những tính năng nổi bật của Bật nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế Sao chép/Chọn là khả năng hoạt động độc lập cho mỗi tab. Chỉ cần nhấp vào biểu tượng tiện ích mở rộng để bật hoặc vô hiệu hóa nó. Thêm vào đó, bạn sẽ không bao giờ phải lo lắng về việc mất cài đặt của mình khi tiện ích mở rộng tự động tự vô hiệu hóa khi tải lại trang. Theo dõi trạng thái của phần mở rộng với một cái nhìn nhanh vào thanh công cụ ở góc trên cùng bên phải. Đó là lý do tại sao phần mở rộng này ở đây để tiết kiệm trong ngày. Nó mở khóa chức năng sao chép để bạn thực sự có thể giải phóng tiềm năng năng suất của mình. Và đừng lo lắng, kích hoạt nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế sao chép/Chọn tôn trọng quyền riêng tư của bạn bằng cách không theo dõi hoặc sử dụng lịch sử duyệt web của bạn theo bất kỳ cách nào. Nó chỉ yêu cầu truy cập vào các trạng thái hoạt động của các tab của bạn. 
 
 Để đảm bảo hoạt động suôn sẻ, hãy nhớ tải lại trang web của bạn sau khi cài đặt tiện ích mở rộng thay đổi trò chơi này. Nếu bạn thực hiện bất kỳ thay đổi nào đối với cài đặt, hãy chắc chắn tải lại tất cả các tab mở để chúng có hiệu lực. Chrome có thể yêu cầu quyền được dán nhãn là "có thể đọc và thay đổi tất cả dữ liệu của bạn trên các trang web bạn truy cập", nhưng hãy yên tâm rằng đơn giản là cần biết các tab nào đang hoạt động. Mức năng suất mới với kích hoạt nhấp chuột phải - Hạn chế sao chép/chọn. Đừng bỏ lỡ phần mở rộng phải có này sẽ cách mạng hóa cách bạn làm việc trong Microsoft Office cho web. Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select is an application that allows users to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and ribbon toolbars when using Office on the web. Installing this free extension enables you to enable copy, allow copy, right click, simple copy, enable right click, restrict copy, context menu, and allow for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This extension works independently for each tab; clicking on the extension icon will enable/disable it. The extension gets disabled on page reload; check the status enabled (green tick) or disabled (grey tick) of the extension on the toolbar (top right corner). 

Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension. It unlocks copy (for real) and remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. This extension does not track or use your browsing history in any ways; the only information it needs is the active states of the tabs. 

Make sure to reload the webpage after installing this extension; if you change the settings any open tabs must be reloaded in order for them to take effect. Since the extension needs to know the active tabs, so the basic permission it requires is "tabs". However, Chrome will label it as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit" while asking for the permission.Introducing the Must-Have Extension: "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select"

Are you tired of the limitations imposed by web browsers when it comes to copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web? Look no further! With the free extension, "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select," you can now unleash the full potential of your copy and paste functions.

This powerful extension grants you the ability to cut, copy, and paste effortlessly using right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar while working with Office on the web. Say goodbye to frustrating restrictions and hello to seamless productivity.

"Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" works independently for each tab, giving you complete control over your copying experience. Simply click on the extension icon to enable or disable it. You'll find the status of the extension conveniently displayed on the toolbar in the top right corner – a green tick indicates enabled, while a grey tick denotes disabled.

But how does this extension work its magic? Well, due to certain limitations inherent to web browsers, additional permissions are required for copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus. This is where "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select" comes in handy. It unlocks the true power of copy (for real) and even remembers which sites to unblock for future visits. Rest assured, this extension respects your privacy by not tracking or utilizing your browsing history in any way. All it needs is knowledge of your active tabs.

To fully enjoy the benefits of this extension, be sure to reload the webpage after installation. If you make any changes to the settings, remember that all open tabs must be reloaded for them to take effect. Chrome may request permission labeled as "can read and change all your data on websites you visit," but fear not – it's simply because the extension needs access to know which tabs are active.

Experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency with "Enable Right Click - Restrict Copy/Select."
